atk-s0202a:598_16: maṃsalohitaṃ ekanti evaṃ caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā arahattaṃ appatvā na vuṭṭhahissāmīti evaṃ paṭipajjatīti dasseti.
atk-s0202a:598_18: Desanaṃ pana bhagavā neyyapuggalassa vasena arahattanikūṭena niṭṭhāpesīti.
atk-s0202a:604_3: so tasmiṃ ārāme eko puṇḍarīko atthīti ekapuṇḍarīko.
atk-s0202a:604_7: Dhammassa cānudhammanti idha sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ dhammo nāma,
atk-s0202a:604_10: Na me teti ananuññāya ṭhatvā anuññampi paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0202a:604_11: “Sabbaññū sabbadassāvī aparisesaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paṭijānātī”ti hi idaṃ anujānitabbaṃ siyā, –
atk-s0202a:604_15: Tasmā ananuññāya ṭhatvā anuññampi paṭikkhipanto evamāha.
atk-s0202a:605_1: Āsavānaṃ khayāti ettha sakiṃ khīṇānaṃ āsavānaṃ puna khepetabbābhāvā yāvadevāti na vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a:605_5: Iti imāhi tīhi vijjāhi sakalabuddhaguṇe saṃkhipitvā kathesi.
atk-s0202a:606_1: Natthi kho vacchāti gihisaṃyojanaṃ appahāya dukkhassantakaro nāma natthi.
atk-s0202a:606_2: Yepi hi santatimahāmatto uggaseno seṭṭhiputto vītasokadārakoti gihiliṅge ṭhitāva arahattaṃ pattā,
atk-s0202a:606_3: tepi maggena sabbasaṅkhāresu nikantiṃ sukkhāpetvā pattā.
atk-s0202a:606_4: Taṃ patvā pana na tena liṅgena aṭṭhaṃsu,
atk-s0202a:606_7: Tasmā tattha ṭhito arahattaṃ patvā taṃdivasameva pabbajati vā parinibbāti vā.
atk-s0202a:606_17: Kāmāvacaradevato upari pana cattāropi ariyā tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0202a:607_3: Tadā kira mahāsatto pāsaṇḍapariggaṇhanatthaṃ pabbajito tassapi pāsaṇḍassa nipphalabhāvaṃ jānitvā vīriyaṃ na hāpesi,
atk-s0202a:611_2: Tattha na kho ahanti paṭhamavāre nāhaṃ sassatadiṭṭhikoti vadati,
atk-s0202a:611_5: Hoti ca na ca hotīti ayaṃ panettha ekaccasassatavādo.
atk-s0202a:611_6: Neva hoti na na hotīti ayaṃ amarāvikkhepoti veditabbo.
atk-s0202a:612_1: Sadukkhanti kilesadukkhena ceva vipākadukkhena ca sadukkhaṃ.
atk-s0202a:613_0: Kiñci diṭṭhigatanti kāci ekā diṭṭhipi ruccitvā khamāpetvā gahitā atthīti pucchati.
atk-s0202a:613_3: Tasmāti yasmā pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayavayaṃ addasa, tasmā.
atk-s0202a:613_12: Anupādā vimuttoti catūhi upādānehi kañci dhammaṃ anupādiyitvā vimutto.
atk-s0202a:614_2: Ettha ca “na upapajjatī”ti idaṃ anujānitabbaṃ siyā.
atk-s0202a:614_3: Yasmā pana evaṃ vutte so paribbājako ucchedaṃ gaṇheyya,
atk-s0202a:614_5: upapajjati ca na ca upapajjatīti ekaccasassataṃ,
atk-s0202a:614_6: neva upapajjati na na upapajjatīti amarāvikkhepaṃ,
atk-s0202a:614_9: sukhapavesanaṭṭhānaṃ mā labhatū”ti ananuññāya ṭhatvā anuññampi paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0202a:614_13: Aññatrācariyakenāti paccayākāraṃ ajānantānaṃ aññesaṃ ācariyānaṃ santike vasantena.
atk-s0202a:615_1: Tena hi vacchāti yasmā tvaṃ sammohamāpādinti vadasi,
atk-s0202a:616_1: Yena rūpenāti yena rūpena sattasaṅkhātaṃ tathāgataṃ rūpīti paññāpeyya.
atk-s0202a:616_5: Seyyathāpi mahāsamuddoti yathā mahāsamuddo gambhīro appameyyo dujjāno,
atk-s0202a:616_7: Taṃ ārabbha upapajjatītiādi sabbaṃ na yujjati. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0202a:616_8: Yathā parinibbutaṃ aggiṃ ārabbha puratthimaṃ disaṃ gatotiādi sabbaṃ na yujjati, evaṃ.
atk-s0202a:621_3: bahuṃ mayā tumhehi saddhiṃ kathitapubbanti kathaṃ sāreti mettiṃ ghaṭeti.
atk-s0202a:621_4: Purimāni hi dve suttāni etasseva kathitāni,
atk-s0202a:621_8: sassato loko idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti abyākatameta”nti evaṃ ekuttaranikāyepi iminā saddhiṃ kathitaṃ atthiyeva.
atk-s0202a:621_10: Sammāsambuddhopi tassa āgatāgatassa saṅgahaṃ katvā okāsamakāsiyeva. Kasmā?
atk-s0202a:621_12: sassatadiṭṭhikā ca sīghaṃ laddhiṃ na vissajjenti,
atk-s0202a:621_15: “ayaṃ paribbājako kāle gacchante gacchante laddhiṃ vissajjetvā mama santike pabbajitvā cha abhiññāyo sacchikatvā abhiññātasāvako bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0202a:621_16: Tasmā tassa āgatāgatassa saṅgahaṃ katvā okāsamakāsiyeva.
atk-s0202a:621_18: So hi imasmiṃ sutte taraṇaṃ vā hotu ataraṇaṃ vā,
atk-s0202a:621_19: yaṭṭhiṃ otaritvā udake patamāno viya samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ gantvā pabbajissāmīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā āgato.
atk-s0202a:621_20: Tasmā dhammadesanaṃ yācanto sādhu me bhavaṃ gotamotiādimāha.
atk-s0202a:621_25: Buddhānaṃ pana nippariyāyena vitthāradesanā nāma natthi.
atk-s0202a:621_26: Catuvīsatisamantapaṭṭhānampi hi sattapakaraṇe abhidhammapiṭake ca sabbaṃ saṃkhittameva.
atk-s0202a:621_27: Tasmā mūlavasenāpi kammapathavasenāpi saṃkhittameva desesīti veditabbo.
atk-s0202a:622_1: Tattha pāṇātipātā veramaṇī kusalantiādīsu paṭipāṭiyā sattadhammā kāmāvacarā,
atk-s0202a:623_2: yathā pana jīvakasutte ca caṅkīsutte ca,
atk-s0202a:623_3: evaṃ imasmiṃ sutte ca attānameva sandhāyetaṃ bhagavatā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a:624_4: sāvako pana arahattaṃ pattuṃ samattho natthi.
atk-s0202a:624_6: bhikkhuno’ti ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ kathento viya katheti,
atk-s0202a:624_7: atthi nu kho samaṇassa gotamassa sāvako arahattappatto”ti.
atk-s0202a:624_9: Tattha tiṭṭhatūti bhavaṃ tāva gotamo tiṭṭhatu,
atk-s0202a:624_11: Tasmiṃ byākate uttari bhikkhunīādīnaṃ vasena pañhaṃ pucchi,
atk-s0202a:626_5: Cattāro maggā apariyāpannā heṭṭhimāni ca tīṇi sāmaññaphalānī”ti vacanato arahattamaggopi anena pattoyeva.
atk-s0202a:631_2: Maggassa pana ekacittakkhaṇikattā tattha ṭhitassa pucchā nāma natthi.
atk-s0202a:631_3: Iminā suttena maggopi bahucittakkhaṇiko hotūti ce.
atk-s0202a:631_6: Tasmā anāgāmiphale ṭhatvā arahattamaggassa vipassanaṃ kathāpetīti veditabbo.
atk-s0202a:631_7: Yasmā panassa na kevalaṃ suddhaarahattasseva upanissayo,
atk-s0202a:631_10: “evamayaṃ samathe kammaṃ katvā pañca abhiññā nibbattessati,
atk-s0202a:631_12: Evaṃ chaḷabhiñño mahāsāvako bhavissatī”ti vipassanāmattaṃ akathetvā samathavipassanā ācikkhi.
atk-s0202a:632_3: Abhiññā vā abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ vā avasāne pana arahattaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ arahattassa vipassanā vāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a:633_1: Pariciṇṇo me bhagavāti satta hi sekhā bhagavantaṃ paricaranti nāma,
atk-s0202a:633_3: Iti saṅkhepena arahattaṃ byākaronto thero evamāha.
atk-s0202a:633_4: Te pana bhikkhū tamatthaṃ na jāniṃsu,
atk-s0202a:637_3: Kassapabuddhakāle kira taṃ leṇaṃ ekasmiṃ buddhantare pathaviyā vaḍḍhamānāya antobhūmigataṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0202a:637_4: Athekadivasaṃ eko sūkaro tassa chadanapariyantasamīpe paṃsuṃ khaṇi.
atk-s0202a:637_5: Deve vuṭṭe paṃsudhoto chadanapariyanto pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0202a:637_8: paṭijaggissāmi na”nti samantato paṃsuṃ apanetvā leṇaṃ sodhetvā kuṭṭaparikkhepaṃ katvā dvāravātapānaṃ yojetvā supariniṭṭhita-
atk-s0202a:637_9: sudhākammacittakammarajatapaṭṭasadisāya vālukāya santhatapariveṇaṃ leṇaṃ katvā mañcapīṭhaṃ paññāpetvā bhagavato vasanatthāya adāsi.
atk-s0202a:638_3: “mayhaṃ mātulo aññaṃ pāsaṇḍaṃ gantvā na ciraṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0202a:638_4: idāni panassa samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ gatassa aḍḍhamāso jāto.
atk-s0202a:638_9: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitoti tasmiṃ kira samaye thero bhagavantaṃ bījayamāno ṭhito hoti,
atk-s0202a:638_10: paribbājako mātule hirottappena ṭhitakova pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0202a:639_0: Sabbaṃ me nakkhamatīti sabbā me upapattiyo nakkhamanti,
atk-s0202a:639_3: Bhagavā panassa adhippāyaṃ muñcitvā akkhare tāva dosaṃ dassento yāpi kho tetiādimāha.
atk-s0202a:639_4: Tattha esāpi te diṭṭhi nakkhamatīti esāpi te paṭhamaṃ ruccitvā khamāpetvā gahitadiṭṭhi nakkhamatīti.
atk-s0202a:639_7: diṭṭhi khameyyāti mayhañhi sabbaṃ nakkhamatīti diṭṭhi,
atk-s0202a:639_8: tassa mayhaṃ yā esā sabbaṃ me nakkhamatīti diṭṭhi,
atk-s0202a:639_12: Yathā sabbagahaṇena gahitāpi ayaṃ diṭṭhi khamati,
atk-s0202a:639_14: Evaṃ attano vāde āropitaṃ dosaṃ ñatvā taṃ pariharāmīti saññāya vadati,
atk-s0202a:639_15: atthato panassa “esā diṭṭhi na me khamatī”ti āpajjati.
atk-s0202a:639_16: Yassa panesā na khamati na ruccati,
atk-s0202a:639_17: tassāyaṃ tāya diṭṭhiyā sabbaṃ me na khamatīti diṭṭhi rucitaṃ.
atk-s0202a:639_18: Tena hi diṭṭhiakkhamena arucitena bhavitabbanti sabbaṃ khamatīti ruccatīti āpajjati.
atk-s0202a:639_28: Bahū hi bahutarāti ettha hikāro nipātamattaṃ,
atk-s0202a:639_30: Parato tanū hi tanutarāti padepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0202a:640_0: Ettha ca sassataṃ gahetvā tampi appahāya ucchedaṃ vā ekaccasassataṃ vā gahetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0202a:640_1: ucchedampi gahetvā taṃ appahāya sassataṃ vā ekaccasassataṃ vā na sakkā gahetuṃ,
atk-s0202a:640_2: ekaccasassatampi gahetvā taṃ appahāya sassataṃ vā ucchedaṃ vā na sakkā gahetuṃ.
atk-s0202a:640_3: Mūlasassataṃ pana appahāya aññaṃ sassatameva sakkā gahetuṃ. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0202a:640_4: Ekasmiñhi samaye “rūpaṃ sassata”nti gahetvā aparasmiṃ samaye “na suddharūpameva sassataṃ,
atk-s0202a:641_5: aññañca diṭṭhiṃ na upādiyantīti tañca mūladassanaṃ pajahanti,
atk-s0202a:641_7: Ekasmiñhi samaye “rūpaṃ sassata”nti gahetvā aparasmiṃ samaye tattha ādīnavaṃ disvā “oḷārikametaṃ mayhaṃ
atk-s0202a:641_8: dassana”nti pajahati “na kevalañca rūpaṃ sassatanti dassanameva oḷārikaṃ,
atk-s0202a:642_2: tassā pana laddhiyā vaṇṇe vuccamāne attano laddhiṃ pātukarissatīti tisso laddhiyo ekato dassetvā vibhajituṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0202a:643_0: Sārāgāya santiketiādīsu rāgavasena vaṭṭe rajjanassa āsannā taṇhādiṭṭhisaṃyojanena vaṭṭasaṃyojanassa santike.
atk-s0202a:643_1: Abhinandanāyāti taṇhādiṭṭhivaseneva gilitvā pariyādiyanassa gahaṇassa ca āsannāti attho.
atk-s0202a:643_2: Asārāgāya santiketiādīsu vaṭṭe arajjanassa āsannātiādinā nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0202a:644_2: Sassatavādī hi idhalokaṃ paralokañca atthīti jānāti,
atk-s0202a:644_8: Buddhānaṃ vā buddhasāvakānaṃ vā sammukhībhūto sīghaṃ laddhiṃ jahituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0202a:644_9: Tasmā taṃ sassatadassanaṃ appasāvajjaṃ dandhavirāganti vuccati.
atk-s0202a:644_16: buddhānaṃ vā buddhasāvakānaṃ vā sammukhībhāve sīghaṃ dassanaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0202a:644_18: asakkonto abhinīhāraṃ katvā sāvako hutvā parinibbāyati.
atk-s0202a:645_3: addhā me sundaraṃ dassana”nti sallakkhetvā ukkaṃseti me bhavantiādimāha.
atk-s0202a:646_0: Idāni yasmā ayaṃ paribbājako kañjiyeneva tittakālābu,
atk-s0202a:646_2: so yathā kañjiyaṃ appahāya na sakkā lābumhi telaphāṇitādīni pakkhipituṃ,
atk-s0202a:646_4: evamevaṃ taṃ laddhiṃ appahāya abhabbo maggaphalānaṃ lābhāya,
atk-s0202a:646_7: Evametāsaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ pahānaṃ hotīti evaṃ viggahādiādīnavaṃ disvā tāsaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ pahānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a:646_8: So hi paribbājako “kiṃ me iminā viggahādinā”ti taṃ ucchedadassanaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0202a:647_1: Athassa bhagavā vamitakañjiye lābumhi sappiphāṇitādīni pakkhipanto viya hadaye amatosadhaṃ pūressāmīti vipassanaṃ ācikkhanto ayaṃ kho pana,
atk-s0202a:647_6: Yo kāyasmiṃ kāyachandoti yā kāyasmiṃ taṇhā.
atk-s0202a:648_0: Evaṃ rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā idāni arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ dassento tisso khotiādimāha.
atk-s0202a:648_1: Puna tāsaṃyeva vedanānaṃ asammissabhāvaṃ dassento yasmiṃ,
atk-s0202a:648_5: yasmiṃ samaye sukhādīsu ekaṃ vedanaṃ vedayati,
atk-s0202a:648_6: tasmiṃ samaye aññā vedanā attano vāraṃ vā okāsaṃ vā olokayamānā nisinnā nāma natthi,
atk-s0202a:648_7: atha kho anuppannāva honti bhinnaudakapupphuḷā viya ca antarahitā vā.
atk-s0202a:648_8: Sukhāpi khotiādi tāsaṃ vedanānaṃ cuṇṇavicuṇṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a:649_0: Na kenaci saṃvadatīti tassataṃ gahetvā “sassatavādī aha”nti ucchedavādināpi saddhiṃ na saṃvadati,
atk-s0202a:649_1: tameva gahetvā “sassatavādī aha”nti ekaccasassatavādinā saddhiṃ na vivadati.
atk-s0202a:649_3: Yañca loke vuttanti yaṃ loke kathitaṃ voharitaṃ,
atk-s0202a:649_4: tena voharati aparāmasanto kiñci dhammaṃ parāmāsaggāhena aggaṇhanto.
atk-s0202a:656_1: “imā kho citta lokasamaññā lokaniruttiyo lokavohārā lokapaññattiyo,
atk-s0202a:657_1: Abhiññāpahānamāhāti sassatādīsu tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ sassataṃ abhiññāya jānitvā sassatassa pahānamāha, ucchedaṃ,
atk-s0202a:657_3: Rūpaṃ abhiññāya rūpassa pahānaṃ vadatītiādinā nayenettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0202a:658_1: Anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccīti anuppādanirodhena niruddhehi āsavehi aggahetvāva cittaṃ vimucci.
atk-s0202a:658_2: Ettāvatā cesa parassa vaḍḍhitaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā khudaṃ vinodento viya parassa āraddhāya dhammadesanāya
atk-s0202a:658_3: ñāṇaṃ pesetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattañceva patto,
atk-s0202a:658_6: Dīghanakho pana sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0202a:659_0: Bhagavā pana imaṃ desanaṃ sūriye dharamāneyeva niṭṭhāpetvā gijjhakūṭā oruyha veḷuvanaṃ gantvā sāvakasannipātamakāsi,
atk-s0202a:659_4: kenaci anāmantitāni hutvā attanoyeva dhammatāya sannipatitāni aḍḍhatelasāni bhikkhusatāni,
atk-s0202a:659_10: ekopi cettha satthakena kese chinditvā pabbajito nāma natthi,
atk-s0202a:663_3: Tiṇasanthāraketi dve māgaṇḍiyā mātulo ca bhāgineyyo ca.
atk-s0202a:663_5: bhāgineyyopi saupanissayo nacirasseva pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissati.
atk-s0202a:663_6: Athassa bhagavā upanissayaṃ disvā ramaṇīyaṃ devagabbhasadisaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ pahāya tattha chārikatiṇakacavarādīhi
atk-s0202a:663_7: uklāpe agyāgāre tiṇasanthārakaṃ paññāpetvā parasaṅgahakaraṇatthaṃ katipāhaṃ vasittha.
atk-s0202a:663_10: yasmā pana taṃ agyāgāraṃ gāmūpacāre dārakadārikāhi okiṇṇaṃ avivittaṃ,
atk-s0202a:663_11: tasmā bhagavā niccakālampi divasabhāgaṃ tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe vītināmetvā sāyaṃ vāsatthāya tattha upagacchati.
atk-s0202a:664_1: tiṇasanthārakaṃ paññattanti bhagavā aññesu divasesu tiṇasanthārakaṃ saṅgharitvā saññāṇaṃ katvā gacchati,
atk-s0202a:664_3: Tadā hi paccūsasamaye lokaṃ oloketvāva addasa –
atk-s0202a:664_4: “ajja māgaṇḍiyo idhāgantvā imaṃ tiṇasanthārakaṃ disvā bhāradvājena saddhiṃ tiṇasanthārakaṃ ārabbha kathāsallāpaṃ karissati,
atk-s0202a:664_6: so dhammaṃ sutvā mama santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissati.
atk-s0202a:664_7: Paresaṃ saṅgahakaraṇatthameva hi mayā pāramiyo pūritā”ti tiṇasanthārakaṃ paññapetvāva agamāsi.
atk-s0202a:665_0: Samaṇaseyyānurūpaṃ maññeti imaṃ tiṇasanthārakaṃ “samaṇassa anucchavikā seyyā”ti maññāmi.
atk-s0202a:665_2: Tathāhettha hatthena ākaḍḍhitaṭṭhānaṃ vā pādena ākaḍḍhitaṭṭhānaṃ vā sīsena pahaṭaṭṭhānaṃ vā na paññāyati,
atk-s0202a:665_3: anākulo anākiṇṇo abhinno chekena cittakārena tūlikāya paricchinditvā paññatto viya.
atk-s0202a:665_28: Evaṃ so chasu dvāresu vaḍḍhiṃ paññapeti.
atk-s0202a:667_0: Ghānena saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu jivhāya saṃvaro.
atk-s0202a:668_0: Kāyena saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu vācāya saṃvaro;
atk-s0202a:669_0: Manasā saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu sabbattha saṃvaro;
atk-s0202a:671_1: Tasmā so “vaḍḍhihato samaṇo gotamo mariyādakārako”ti maññamāno “bhūnahuno”ti āha.
atk-s0202a:672_0: Ariye ñāye dhamme kusaleti parisuddhe kāraṇadhamme anavajje.
atk-s0202a:672_2: Evarūpassa nāma uggatassa paññātassa yasassino upari vācaṃ bhāsamānena vīmaṃsitvā upadhāretvā mukhe ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā bhāsitabbo hoti.
atk-s0202a:672_5: Evañhi no sutte ocaratīti yasmā amhākaṃ sutte evaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0202a:672_7: sutte ca nāma āgataṃ vadamānā kassa bhāyeyyāma,
atk-s0202a:672_9: Appossukkoti mama rakkhanatthāya anussukko avāvaṭo hutvāti attho.
atk-s0202a:672_10: Vuttova naṃ vadeyyāti mayā vuttova hutvā apucchitova kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā ambajambūādīni gahetvā viya
atk-s0202a:672_11: apūrayamāno mayā kathitaniyāmena bhavaṃ bhāradvājo vadeyya,
atk-s0202a:673_1: Assosi khoti satthā ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbacakkhunā māgaṇḍiyaṃ tattha āgataṃ addasa,
atk-s0202a:673_2: dvinnaṃ janānaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ dibbasotena saddampi assosi.
atk-s0202a:673_6: “neva māgaṇḍiyena samaṇassa gotamassa ārocitaṃ, na mayā.
atk-s0202a:673_7: Amhe muñcitvā añño ettha tatiyopi natthi,
atk-s0202a:673_8: suto bhavissati amhākaṃ saddo tikhiṇasotena purisenā”ti.
atk-s0202a:673_9: Athassa abbhantare pīti uppajjitvā navanavutilomakūpasahassāni uddhaggāni akāsi.
atk-s0202a:673_11: Atha kho māgaṇḍiyo paribbājakoti paribbājakassa pabhinnamukhaṃ viya bījaṃ paripākagataṃ ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0202a:673_12: tasmā sannisīdituṃ asakkonto āhiṇḍamāno puna satthu santikaṃ āgantvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0202a:674_5: Tattha vasanaṭṭhānaṭṭhena rūpaṃ cakkhussa ārāmoti cakkhu rūpārāmaṃ.
atk-s0202a:675_5: kimassa vacanīyanti imassa rūpaṃ pariggaṇhitvā arahattappattassa khīṇāsavassa tayā kiṃ vacanaṃ vattabbaṃ assa,
atk-s0202a:676_1: Idāni yasmā tayā pañcakkhandhe pariggahetvā arahattappattassa khīṇāsavassa kiñci vattabbaṃ natthi,
atk-s0202a:676_3: tasmā ahampi te na kiñci vattabboti dassetuṃ ahaṃ kho panātiādimāha.
atk-s0202a:676_4: Tassa mayhaṃ māgaṇḍiyāti gihikāle attano sampattiṃ dassento āha.
atk-s0202a:676_5: Tattha vassikotiādīsu yattha sukhaṃ hoti vassakāle vasituṃ,
atk-s0202a:677_0: Tattha vassiko pāsādo nātiucco hoti nātinīco,
atk-s0202a:677_12: Vātapānasamīpesu cettha nava cāṭiyo ṭhapetvā udakassa pūretvā nīluppalādīhi sañchādenti.
atk-s0202a:677_14: yehi deve vassante viya udakadhārā nikkhamanti.
atk-s0202a:678_0: Bodhisattassa pana aṭṭhasatasuvaṇṇaghaṭe ca rajataghaṭe ca gandhodakassa pūretvā nīluppalagacchake katvā sayanaṃ parivāretvā ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0202a:678_1: Mahantesu lohakaṭāhesu gandhakalalaṃ pūretvā nīluppalapadumapuṇḍarīkāni ropetvā utuggahaṇatthāya tattha tattha ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0202a:678_3: Nānāvidhā bhamaragaṇā pāsādaṃ pavisitvā pupphesu rasaṃ gaṇhantā vicaranti.
atk-s0202a:678_5: Yamakabhittiyā antare lohanāḷiṃ ṭhapetvā navabhūmikapāsādassa upari ākāsaṅgaṇe ratanamaṇḍapamatthake sukhumacchiddakaṃ jālaṃ baddhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0202a:678_15: Parivārāpissa cattālīsanāṭakasahassāni nīlavatthābharaṇāneva nīlavilepanāni hutvā mahāpurisaṃ parivāretvā ratanamaṇḍapaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0202a:678_16: Divasabhāgaṃ udakakīḷaṃ kīḷanto sītalaṃ utusukhaṃ anubhoti.
atk-s0202a:679_0: Pāsādassa catūsu disāsu cattāro sarā honti.
atk-s0202a:679_1: Divākāle nānāvaṇṇasakuṇagaṇā pācīnasarato vuṭṭhāya viravamānā pāsādamatthakena pacchimasaraṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0202a:680_6: “tathārūpaṃ issariyasukhasampattiṃ anubhavamānassa purisaṃ disvā parisaṅkā uppajjati,
atk-s0202a:680_7: sā me puttassa mā ahosī”ti sabbakiccesu itthiyova ṭhapesi.
atk-s0202a:680_8: Tāya ratiyā ramamānoti idaṃ catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpattiratiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a:681_1: Gahapati vā gahapatiputto vāti ettha yasmā khattiyānaṃ setacchattasmiṃyeva patthanā hoti,
atk-s0202a:681_3: brāhmaṇā mantehi atittā mante gavesantā vicaranti,
atk-s0202a:681_4: gahapatino pana muddāgaṇanamattaṃ uggahitakālato paṭṭhāya sampattiṃyeva anubhavanti,
atk-s0202a:681_5: tasmā khattiyabrāhmaṇe aggahetvā “gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā”ti āha.
atk-s0202a:684_0: Samadhigayha tiṭṭhatīti dibbasukhaṃ gaṇhitvā tato visiṭṭhatarā hutvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0202a:685_1: gahapatissa pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samaṅgībhūtakālo viya bodhisattassa tīsu pāsādesu cattālīsasahassaitthimajjhe modanakālo,
atk-s0202a:685_2: tassa sucaritaṃ pūretvā sagge nibbattakālo viya bodhisattassa abhinikkhamanaṃ katvā bodhipallaṅke sabbaññutaṃ paṭividdhakālo,
atk-s0202a:685_3: tassa nandanavane sampattiṃ anubhavanakālo viya tathāgatassa catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpattiratiyā vītivattanakālo,
atk-s0202a:685_4: tassa mānusakānaṃ pañcannaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ apatthanakālo viya tathāgatassa catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpattiratiyā
atk-s0202a:686_1: Sukhīti paṭhamaṃ dukkhito pacchā sukhito assa.
atk-s0202a:686_2: Serīti paṭhamaṃ vejjadutiyako pacchā serī ekako bhaveyya.
atk-s0202a:686_3: Sayaṃvasīti paṭhamaṃ vejjassa vase vattamāno vejjena nisīdāti vutte nisīdi,
atk-s0202a:686_8: Yena kāmaṃ gamoti paṭhamaṃ icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṃ gantuṃ nālattha,
atk-s0202a:687_1: purisassa kuṭṭhikālo viya hi bodhisattassa agāramajjhe vasanakālo,
atk-s0202a:687_4: sakkassa pana devarañño aḍḍhateyyakoṭiyāni aṅgārakapallāni viya aḍḍhatiyanāṭakakoṭiyo,
atk-s0202a:687_5: nakhehi vaṇamukhāni tacchetvā aṅgārakapalle paritāpanaṃ viya vatthupaṭisevanaṃ,
atk-s0202a:687_6: bhesajjaṃ āgamma arogakālo viya kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā nikkhamma buddhabhūtakāle
atk-s0202a:687_8: aññaṃ kuṭṭhipurisaṃ disvā apatthanakālo viya tāya ratiyā vītināmentassa hīnajanaratiyā apatthanakāloti.
atk-s0202a:688_3: Te yathā so upahatakāyindriyo kuṭṭhī dukkhasamphassasmiṃyeva aggismiṃ sukhamiti viparītasaññaṃ paccalattha,
atk-s0202a:688_4: evaṃ paññindriyassa upahatattā dukkhasamphassesveva kāmesu sukhamiti viparītasaññaṃ paccalatthuṃ.
atk-s0202a:689_1: Asucitarāni cevātiādīsu pakatiyāva tāni asucīni ca duggandhāni ca pūtīni ca,
atk-s0202a:689_2: idāni pana asucitarāni ceva duggandhatarāni ca pūtitarāni ca honti.
atk-s0202a:689_3: Kācīti tassa hi paritāpentassa ca kaṇḍūvantassa ca pāṇakā anto pavisanti,
atk-s0202a:690_0: Ārogyaparamāti gāthāya ye keci dhanalābhā vā yasalābhā vā puttalābhā vā atthi,
atk-s0202a:690_4: Yaṃkiñci jhānasukhaṃ vā maggasukhaṃ vā phalasukhaṃ vā atthi,
atk-s0202a:690_6: natthi tato uttaritaraṃ sukhanti nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukhaṃ.
atk-s0202a:690_7: Aṭṭhaṅgiko maggānanti pubbabhāgamaggānaṃ pubbabhāgagamaneneva amatagāmīnaṃ aṭṭhaṅgiko khemo,
atk-s0202a:690_9: Atha vā khemaṃ amatagāminanti ettha khemantipi amatantipi nibbānasseva nāmaṃ.
atk-s0202a:690_10: Yāvatā puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇā parappavādā khemagāmino ca amatagāmino cāti laddhivasena gahitā,
atk-s0202a:690_11: sabbesaṃ tesaṃ khemaamatagāmīnaṃ maggānaṃ aṭṭhaṅgiko paramo uttamoti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0202a:691_2: Sametīti ekanāḷiyā mitaṃ viya ekatulāya tulitaṃ viya sadisaṃ hoti ninnānākaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0202a:691_6: idaṃ taṃ nibbāna”nti kālena sīsaṃ kālena uraṃ parimajjanto evamāha.
atk-s0202a:692_4: Vācaṃ nicchāreyyāti kālena dasāya kālena ante kālena majjhe parimajjanto nicchāreyya,
atk-s0202a:692_8: kassapopi bhagavā catuparisamajjhe nisinno imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi,
atk-s0202a:692_10: Satthari parinibbute aparabhāge paribbājakānaṃ antaraṃ paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0202a:692_11: Te potthakagataṃ katvā padadvayameva rakkhituṃ sakkhiṃsu. Tenāha –
atk-s0202a:693_5: Bhesajjaṃ kareyyāti uddhaṃvirecanaṃ adhovirecanaṃ añjanañcāti bhesajjaṃ kareyya.
atk-s0202a:694_1: Na cakkhūni uppādeyyāti yassa hi antarā pittasemhādipaliveṭhena cakkhupasādo upahato hoti,
atk-s0202a:694_2: so chekaṃ vejjaṃ āgamma sappāyabhesajjaṃ sevanto cakkhūni uppādeti nāma.
atk-s0202a:695_1: Dutiyavāre jaccandhoti jātakālato paṭṭhāya pittādipaliveṭhena andho.
atk-s0202a:695_3: Amittatopi daheyyāti amitto me ayanti evaṃ amittato ṭhapeyya.
atk-s0202a:695_6: Tassa me upādānapaccayāti ekasandhi dvisaṅkhepo paccayākāro kathito,
atk-s0202a:696_2: Ime rogā gaṇḍā sallāti pañcakkhandhe dasseti.
atk-s0202a:700_2: Tattha pilakkhaguhāyanti tassā guhāya dvāre pilakkharukkho ahosi,
atk-s0202a:700_8: ekato umaṅgaṃ katvā khāṇuke ca paṃsuñca nīharitvā anto thambhe ussāpetvā matthake padaracchannagehasaṅkhepena katā,
atk-s0202a:700_13: Vihāradassanatthañhi anamataggiyaṃ paccavekkhitvā samuddapabbatadassanatthaṃ vāpi gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
atk-s0202a:701_4: Tesaṃ paribbājakānaṃ pātova uṭṭhāya kattabbaṃ nāma cetiyavattaṃ vā bodhivattaṃ vā ācariyupajjhāyavattaṃ vā yonisomanasikāro vā natthi.
atk-s0202a:701_5: Tena te pātova uṭṭhāya bālātape nisinnā,
atk-s0202a:701_6: sāyaṃ vā kathāya phāsukatthāya sannipatitā “imassa hattho sobhaṇo imassa pādo”ti evaṃ aññamaññassa hatthapādādīni
atk-s0202a:701_7: vā ārabbha itthipurisadārakadārikāvaṇṇe vā aññaṃ vā kāmassādabhavassādādivatthuṃ ārabbha kathaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0202a:701_9: Sā hi aniyyānikattā saggamokkhamaggānaṃ tiracchānabhūtā kathāti tiracchānakathā.
atk-s0202a:701_10: Tattha rājānaṃ ārabbha “mahāsammato mandhātā dhammāsoko evaṃmahānubhāvo”tiādinā nayena pavattā kathā rājakathā.
atk-s0202a:702_0: Tesu “asuko rājā abhirūpo dassanīyo”tiādinā nayena gehassitakathāva tiracchānakathā hoti.
atk-s0202a:702_1: “Sopi nāma evaṃ mahānubhāvo khayaṃ gato”ti evaṃ pavattā pana kammaṭṭhānabhāve tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0202a:702_3: meghamālo evaṃmahānubhāvo”ti tesaṃ kammaṃ paṭicca aho sūrāti gehassitakathāva tiracchānakathā.
atk-s0202a:702_4: Yuddhepi bhāratayuddhādīsu “asukena asuko evaṃ mārito evaṃ viddho”ti kāmassādavaseneva kathā tiracchānakathā.
atk-s0202a:702_5: “Tepi nāma khayaṃ gatā”ti evaṃ pavattā pana sabbattha kathā kammaṭṭhānameva hoti.
atk-s0202a:702_6: Apica annādīsu “evaṃ vaṇṇavantaṃ gandhavantaṃ rasavantaṃ phassasampannaṃ khādimha bhuñjimha pivimha paribhuñjimhā”ti
atk-s0202a:702_9: “pubbe evaṃ vaṇṇādisampannaṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ sayanaṃ mālaṃ gandhaṃ sīlavantānaṃ adamha,
atk-s0202a:703_0: Ñātikathādīsupi “amhākaṃ ñātakā sūrā samatthā”ti vā “pubbe mayaṃ evaṃ vicitrehi yānehi carimhā”ti vā assādavasena vattuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0202a:703_1: sātthakaṃ pana katvā “tepi no ñātakā khayaṃ gatā”ti vā “pubbe mayaṃ evarūpā upāhanā saṅghassa adamhā”ti vā kathetabbā.
atk-s0202a:703_2: Gāmakathāpi suniviṭṭhadunniviṭṭhasubhikkhadubbhikkhādivasena vā “asukagāmavāsino sūrā samatthā”ti vā evaṃ assādavasena na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0202a:703_3: sātthakaṃ pana katvā saddhā pasannāti vā khayavayaṃ gatāti vā vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0202a:703_5: Itthikathāpi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīni paṭicca assādavasena na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0202a:703_6: saddhā pasannā khayaṃ gatāti evameva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0202a:703_7: Sūrakathāpi nandimitto nāma yodho sūro ahosīti assādavaseneva na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0202a:703_8: saddho pasanno ahosi khayaṃ gatoti evameva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0202a:703_9: Visikhākathāpi asukā visikhā suniviṭṭhā dunniviṭṭhā sūrā samatthāti assādavaseneva na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0202a:703_10: saddhā pasannā khayaṃ gatā iccevaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0202a:704_0: Kumbhaṭṭhānakathāti kumbhaṭṭhānaudakatitthakathā vā vuccati kumbhadāsikathā vā.
atk-s0202a:704_1: Sāpi “pāsādikā naccituṃ gāyituṃ chekā”ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0202a:705_4: bakā rattā lohitassa rattattāti evamādikā lokāyatavitaṇḍasallāpakathā.
atk-s0202a:706_2: khato meti hatthamuddāya niveditattā samuddoti evamādikā niratthakā samuddakkhāyikakathā.
atk-s0202a:706_4: iti abhavoti yaṃ vā taṃ vā niratthakakāraṇaṃ vatvā pavattitakathā itibhavābhavakathā.
atk-s0202a:706_11: Iti imāya chabbidhāya itibhavābhavakathāya saddhiṃ bāttiṃsatiracchānakathā nāma hoti.
atk-s0202a:707_0: Tato sandako paribbājako te paribbājake oloketvā –
atk-s0202a:707_2: mayañca samaṇassa gotamassa pātubhāvato paṭṭhāya sūriyuggamane khajjopanakūpamā jātā,
atk-s0202a:707_4: Sace pana imaṃ ṭhānaṃ samaṇo gotamo gotamasāvako vā gihiupaṭṭhākopi vāssa āgaccheyya,
atk-s0202a:707_6: Parisadoso kho pana parisajeṭṭhakasseva upari ārohatī”ti ito cito ca vilokento theraṃ addasa.
atk-s0202a:707_7: Tena vuttaṃ addasā kho sandako paribbājako…pe…
atk-s0202a:708_4: Yathā nāma parisamajjhaṃ pavisanto puriso vajjapaṭicchādanatthaṃ nivāsanaṃ saṇṭhapeti,
atk-s0202a:708_7: evamassā vajjapaṭicchādanatthaṃ “appasaddā bhonto”ti sikkhāpento yathā suṭṭhapitā hoti,
atk-s0202a:708_14: Appasaddassa vaṇṇavādinoti yaṃ ṭhānaṃ appasaddaṃ nissaddaṃ.
atk-s0202a:709_2: Paribbājakā kira buddhesu vā buddhasāvakesu vā attano santikaṃ āgatesu –
atk-s0202a:709_5: na kho panete yassa vā tassa vā santikaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0202a:709_6: passatha amhākaṃ uttamabhāva”nti attano upaṭṭhākānaṃ santike attānaṃ ukkhipanti ucce ṭhāne ṭhapenti.
atk-s0202a:709_8: Te kira bhagavato upaṭṭhāke disvā evaṃ vadanti –
atk-s0202a:709_9: “tumhākaṃ satthā bhavaṃ gotamopi gotamassa sāvakāpi amhākaṃ santikaṃ āgacchanti,
atk-s0202a:709_11: Tumhe pana amhe akkhīhi passituṃ na icchatha,
atk-s0202a:709_16: kiṃ amhāka”nti tato paṭṭhāya te disvā nappamajjanti.
atk-s0202a:709_17: Tuṇhī ahesunti sandakaṃ parivāretvā nissaddā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0202a:710_1: Svāgataṃ bhoto ānandassāti suāgamanaṃ bhoto ānandassa.
atk-s0202a:710_2: Bhavante hi no āgate ānando hoti,
atk-s0202a:710_5: Thero pana kālena kālaṃ paribbājakārāmaṃ cārikatthāya gacchatīti purimagamanaṃ gahetvā evamāha.
atk-s0202a:710_6: Evañca pana vatvā na mānatthaddho hutvā nisīdi,
atk-s0202a:710_7: attano pana āsanā vuṭṭhāya taṃ āsanaṃ papphoṭetvā theraṃ āsanena nimantento nisīdatu bhavaṃ ānando,
atk-s0202a:711_0: Antarākathā vippakatāti nisinnānaṃ vo ārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva mamāgamanaṃ etasmiṃ antare kā nāma kathā vippakatā,
atk-s0202a:711_1: mamāgamanapaccayā katamā kathā pariyantaṃ na gatāti pucchati.
atk-s0202a:712_1: na tumhākaṃ purato vattabbataṃ arahatī”ti dīpento tiṭṭhatesā,
atk-s0202a:712_3: Nesā bhototi sace bhavaṃ sotukāmo bhavissati,
atk-s0202a:712_6: Bhoto pana āgamanaṃ labhitvā aññadeva sukāraṇaṃ kathaṃ sotukāmamhāti dīpeti.
atk-s0202a:712_7: Tato dhammadesanaṃ yācanto sādhu vata bhavantaṃ ye vātiādimāha.
atk-s0202a:712_11: viññū puriso ekaṃseneva na vaseyyāti attho.
atk-s0202a:712_14: Ñāyaṃ dhammaṃ kusalanti kāraṇabhūtaṃ anavajjaṭṭhena kusalaṃ dhammaṃ.
atk-s0202a:713_13: cattāro mañcapāde gahetvā ṭhitā cattāro purisā cāti attho.
atk-s0202a:714_4: na tato paraṃ phaladāyakaṃ hutvā gacchatīti attho.
atk-s0202a:714_11: Atthikavādanti atthi dinnaṃ dinnaphalanti imaṃ atthikavādaṃyeva vadanti tesaṃ tucchaṃ vacanaṃ musāvilāpo.
atk-s0202a:714_12: Bāle ca paṇḍite cāti bālā ca paṇḍitā ca.
atk-s0202a:715_0: Akatena me ettha katanti mayhaṃ akateneva samaṇakammena ettha etassa samaye kammaṃ kataṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0202a:716_0: 226. Karatotiādīni apaṇṇakasutte vuttāni. Tathā natthi hetūtiādīni.
atk-s0202a:717_3: evaṃ karohīti kenaci kārāpitā na hontīti attho.
atk-s0202a:717_16: taṃ muñjato īsikā viya vijjamānameva nikkhamatīti.
atk-s0202a:717_21: Na iñjantīti esikatthambho viya ṭhitattā na calanti.
atk-s0202a:717_23: Na aññamaññaṃ byābādhentīti aññamaññaṃ na upahananti.
atk-s0202a:718_3: Natthi hantā vāti hantuṃ vā ghātetuṃ vā sotuṃ vā sāvetuṃ vā jānituṃ vā jānāpetuṃ vā samattho nāma natthīti dīpeti.
atk-s0202a:718_4: Sattannaṃtveva kāyānanti yathā muggarāsiādīsu pahaṭaṃ satthaṃ muggarāsiādīnaṃ antarena pavisati,
atk-s0202a:718_5: evaṃ sattannaṃ kāyānaṃ antarena chiddena vivarena satthaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0202a:718_6: Tattha “ahaṃ imaṃ jīvitā voropemī”ti kevalaṃ saññāmattameva hotīti dasseti.
atk-s0202a:718_7: Yonipamukhasatasahassānīti pamukhayonīnaṃ uttamayonīnaṃ cuddasasatasahassāni aññāni ca saṭṭhisatāni aññāni ca chasatāni.
atk-s0202a:718_8: Pañca ca kammuno satānīti pañca kammasatāni ca,
atk-s0202a:718_10: Pañca ca kammāni tīṇi ca kammānītiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0202a:718_11: Keci panāhu pañca kammānīti pañcindriyavasena bhaṇati.
atk-s0202a:718_13: Kamme ca aḍḍhakamme cāti ettha panassa kāyakammañca vacīkammañca kammanti laddhi,
atk-s0202a:718_16: Dvaṭṭhantarakappāti ekasmiṃ kappe catusaṭṭhi antarakappā nāma honti,
atk-s0202a:718_17: ayaṃ pana aññe dve ajānanto evamāha.
atk-s0202a:719_0: Aṭṭha purisabhūmiyoti mandabhūmi khiḍḍābhūmi vīmaṃsakabhūmi ujugatabhūmi sekkhabhūmi samaṇabhūmi jinabhūmi
atk-s0202a:719_2: Tattha jātadivasato paṭṭhāya sattadivase sambādhaṭṭhānato nikkhantattā sattā mandā honti momūhā.
atk-s0202a:719_5: te abhiṇhaṃ rodanti ceva viravanti ca.
atk-s0202a:719_6: Sugatito āgatā taṃ anussaritvā anussaritvā hasanti.
atk-s0202a:719_8: Mātāpitūnaṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ padanikkhipanaṃ vīmaṃsakabhūmi nāma.
atk-s0202a:719_13: Bhikkhu ca pannako jino na kiñci āhāti evaṃ alābhiṃ samaṇaṃ pannabhūmīti vadati.
atk-s0202a:721_12: Ettha ekamhā sarā vassasate vassasate kusaggena ekaṃ udakabinduṃ nīharitvā nīharitvā sattakkhattuṃ tamhi sare nirudake kate eko mahākappoti vadati.
atk-s0202a:721_13: Evarūpānaṃ mahākappānaṃ caturāsītisatasahassāni khepetvā bālā ca paṇḍitā ca dukkhassantaṃ karontīti ayamassa laddhi.
atk-s0202a:721_14: Paṇḍitopi kira antarā sujjhituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0202a:722_0: Sīlenāti acelakasīlena vā aññena vā yena kenaci.
atk-s0202a:722_3: Aparipakkaṃ paripāceti nāma yo “ahaṃ paṇḍito”ti antarā visujjhati.
atk-s0202a:722_4: Paripakkaṃ phussa phussa byantiṃ karoti nāma yo “ahaṃ bālo”ti vuttaparimāṇaṃ kālaṃ atikkamitvā yāti.
atk-s0202a:722_6: Tañhi ubhayampi na sakkā kātunti dīpeti.
atk-s0202a:722_15: Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya sādhento seyyathāpi nāmātiādimāha.
atk-s0202a:722_17: Nibbeṭhiyamānameva paletīti pabbate vā rukkhagge vā ṭhatvā khittaṃ suttapamāṇena nibbeṭhiyamānaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0202a:722_18: sutte khīṇe tattha tiṭṭhati na gacchati.
atk-s0202a:722_19: Evamevaṃ vuttakālato uddhaṃ na gacchatīti dasseti.
atk-s0202a:723_2: kiṃ sabbaññu nāma tvanti evaṃ puṭṭho samāno niyativāde pakkhipanto suññaṃ me agārantiādimāha.
atk-s0202a:725_3: Vācāvikkhepaṃ āpajjatīti vācāya vikkhepaṃ āpajjati. Kīdisaṃ?
atk-s0202a:725_7: Sā ummujjananimmujjanādivasena udake sandhāvamānā gahetuṃ na sakkāti evameva ayampi vādo ito cito ca sandhāvati,
atk-s0202a:726_0: Evantipi me notiādīsu idaṃ kusalanti puṭṭho “evantipi me no”ti vadati,
atk-s0202a:726_1: tato kiṃ akusalanti vutte “tathātipi me no”ti vadati,
atk-s0202a:726_2: kiṃ ubhayato aññathāti vutte “aññathātipi me no”ti vadati,
atk-s0202a:726_3: tato tividhenāpi na hotīti te laddhīti vutte “notipi me no”ti vadati,
atk-s0202a:726_4: tato kiṃ no noti te laddhīti vutte “no notipi me no”ti vikkhepamāpajjati,
atk-s0202a:726_6: Nibbijja pakkamatīti attanopi esa satthā avassayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0202a:727_1: Sannidhikārakaṃ kāme paribhuñjitunti yathā pubbe gihibhūto sannidhiṃ katvā vatthukāme paribhuñjati,
atk-s0202a:727_2: evaṃ tilataṇḍulasappinavanītādīni sannidhiṃ katvā idāni paribhuñjituṃ abhabboti attho.
atk-s0202a:727_3: Nanu ca khīṇāsavassa vasanaṭṭhāne tilataṇḍulādayo paññāyantīti.
atk-s0202a:727_5: na panesa te attano atthāya ṭhapeti,
atk-s0202a:728_1: Puttamatāya puttāti so kira imaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā ājīvakā matā nāmāti saññī hutvā evamāha.
atk-s0202a:728_5: iti ājīvakā puttamatāya puttā nāma honti.
atk-s0202a:728_6: Samaṇe gotameti samaṇe gotame brahmacariyavāso atthi,
atk-s0202a:732_2: Tattha moranivāpeti tasmiṃ ṭhāne morānaṃ abhayaṃ ghosetvā bhojanaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0202a:732_3: Tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ moranivāpoti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0202a:732_6: Aññe cāti na kevalaṃ ime tayo,
atk-s0202a:732_8: Appasaddassa vaṇṇavādīti idha appasaddavinītoti avatvāva idaṃ vuttaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0202a:733_1: Purimānīti hiyyodivasaṃ upādāya purimāni nāma honti,
atk-s0202a:733_4: yattha pana nānātitthiyā samaṇabrāhmaṇā nānāvidhaṃ kathaṃ pavattenti,
atk-s0202a:733_9: Lābhāti ye evarūpe samaṇabrāhmaṇe daṭṭhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchituṃ dhammakathaṃ vā nesaṃ sotuṃ labhanti,
atk-s0202a:734_0: Saṅghinotiādīsu pabbajitasamūhasaṅkhāto saṅgho etesaṃ atthīti saṅghino.
atk-s0202a:734_4: Yathābhuccaguṇehi ceva ayathābhūtaguṇehi ca samuggato yaso etesaṃ atthīti yasassino.
atk-s0202a:734_6: appicchatāya vatthampi na nivāsetī”tiādinā nayena yaso samuggato,
atk-s0202a:734_9: Sādhusammatāti ime sādhū sundarā sappurisāti evaṃ sammatā.
atk-s0202a:734_10: Bahujanassāti assutavato ceva andhabālaputhujjanassa vibhāvino ca paṇḍitajanassa.
atk-s0202a:734_13: Iminā nayena pūraṇo kassapo saṅghītiādīsu attho veditabbo.
atk-s0202a:734_14: Bhagavā pana yasmā aṭṭhatiṃsa ārammaṇāni vibhajanto bahūni nibbānaotaraṇatitthāni akāsi,
atk-s0202a:735_5: Samaṇassa ca gotamassa upaṭṭhāke sakkāraṃ karonte disvā amhākampi upaṭṭhākā amhākaṃ sakkāraṃ karissantī”ti.
atk-s0202a:736_6: Sahitaṃ meti mayhaṃ vacanaṃ sahitaṃ siliṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0202a:736_9: Adhiciṇṇaṃ te viparāvattanti yaṃ tuyhaṃ dīgharattāciṇṇavasena suppaguṇaṃ,
atk-s0202a:736_10: taṃ mayhaṃ ekavacaneneva viparāvattaṃ viparivattitvā ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0202a:736_12: Āropito te vādoti mayā tava vāde doso āropito.
atk-s0202a:736_15: Nibbeṭhehi vā sace pahosīti atha sayaṃ pahosi,
atk-s0202a:737_1: Taṃ no sossāmāti taṃ amhākaṃ desitaṃ dhammaṃ suṇissāma.
atk-s0202a:737_5: Paccāsīsamānarūpoti pūretvā nu kho no bhojanaṃ dassatīti bhājanahattho paccāsīsamāno paccupaṭṭhito assa.
atk-s0202a:738_2: Pavivittoti idaṃ paribbājako kāyavivekamattaṃ sandhāya vadati,
atk-s0202a:739_1: Kosakāhārāpīti dānapatīnaṃ ghare aggabhikkhāṭhapanatthaṃ khuddakasarāvā honti,
atk-s0202a:739_2: dānapatino aggabhattaṃ vā tattha ṭhapetvā bhuñjanti,
atk-s0202a:739_3: pabbajite sampatte taṃ bhattaṃ tassa denti.
atk-s0202a:739_5: Tasmā ye ca ekeneva bhattakosakena yāpenti,
atk-s0202a:739_10: Ettha pana sabbākāreneva bhagavā anappāhāroti na vattabbo.
atk-s0202a:739_12: verañjāyaṃ tayo māse patthodaneneva yāpesi pālileyyakavanasaṇḍe tayo māse bhisamuḷāleheva yāpesi.
atk-s0202a:739_15: mayhaṃ pana sāvakā dhutaṅgasamādānato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ na bhindantī”ti.
atk-s0202a:739_16: Tasmā yadi te iminā dhammena sakkareyyuṃ,
atk-s0202a:740_5: Uccinitvāti phāletvā dubbalaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya thiraṭṭhānameva gahetvā.
atk-s0202a:740_7: Ettāvatā ca satthā cīvarasantosena asantuṭṭhoti na vattabbo.
atk-s0202a:740_8: Atimuttakasusānato hissa puṇṇadāsiyā pārupitvā pātitasāṇapaṃsukūlaṃ gahaṇadivase udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavī akampi.
atk-s0202a:740_11: mayhaṃ pana sāvakā dhutaṅgasamādānato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ na bhindantī”ti.
atk-s0202a:741_2: Uñchāsake vate ratāti uñchācariyasaṅkhāte bhikkhūnaṃ pakativate ratā,
atk-s0202a:741_3: uccanīcagharadvāraṭṭhāyino hutvā kabaramissakaṃ bhattaṃ saṃharitvā paribhuñjantīti attho.
atk-s0202a:741_6: Ettāvatā ca satthā piṇḍapātasantosena asantuṭṭhoti na vattabbo,
atk-s0202a:741_10: mayhaṃ pana sāvakā dhutaṅgasamādānato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ na bhindantī”ti.
atk-s0202a:742_4: Ettāvatā ca satthā senāsanasantosena asantuṭṭhoti na vattabbo,
atk-s0202a:742_5: senāsanasantoso panassa chabbassikamahāpadhānena ca pālileyyakavanasaṇḍena ca dīpetabbo.
atk-s0202a:742_8: mayhaṃ pana sāvakā dhutaṅgasamādānato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ na bhindantī”ti.
atk-s0202a:743_2: baddhasīmāyaṃ pana vasantā attano vasanaṭṭhāneyeva uposathaṃ karonti.
atk-s0202a:743_3: Ettāvatā ca satthā no pavivittoti na vattabbo,
atk-s0202a:743_7: Idha pana etamatthaṃ dasseti “ahaṃ ekasmiṃyeva tathārūpe kāle paṭisalliyiṃ,
atk-s0202a:743_8: mayhaṃ pana sāvakā dhutaṅgasamādānato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ na bhindantī”ti.
atk-s0202a:744_2: Kiṃ pana appaccayaṃ nibbānaṃ na desetīti.
atk-s0202a:744_4: sahetukaṃ pana taṃ desanaṃ katvā deseti,
atk-s0202a:745_1: Anāgataṃ vādapathanti ajja ṭhapetvā sve vā punadivase vā aḍḍhamāse vā māse vā saṃvacchare vā tassa tassa pañhassa upari āgamanavādapathaṃ.
atk-s0202a:745_2: Na dakkhatīti yathā saccako nigaṇṭho attano niggahaṇatthaṃ āgatakāraṇaṃ visesetvā vadanto na addasa,
atk-s0202a:745_3: evaṃ na dakkhatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
atk-s0202a:745_5: Antarantarā kathaṃ opāteyyunti mama kathāvāraṃ pacchinditvā antarantare attano kathaṃ paveseyyunti attho.
atk-s0202a:745_8: “aho vata me ekasāvakopi upamaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ vā āharitvā dadeyyā”ti evaṃ sāvakesu anusāsaniṃ na paccāsīsāmi.
atk-s0202a:745_9: Mamayevāti evarūpesu ṭhānesu sāvakā mamayeva anusāsaniṃ ovādaṃ paccāsīsanti.
atk-s0202a:746_1: Tesāhaṃ cittaṃ ārādhemīti tesaṃ ahaṃ tassa pañhassa veyyākaraṇena cittaṃ gaṇhāmi sampādemi paripūremi,
atk-s0202a:746_3: ambaṃ puṭṭho labujaṃ viya labujaṃ vā puṭṭho ambaṃ viya.
atk-s0202a:746_4: Ettha ca “adhisīle sambhāventī”ti vuttaṭṭhāne buddhasīlaṃ nāma kathitaṃ,
atk-s0202a:746_8: Tattha sabbaññutaññāṇañca saccabyākaraṇapaññañca ṭhapetvā avasesā paññā adhipaññaṃ bhajati.
atk-s0202a:747_1: Idāni tesaṃ tesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ paṭipadaṃ ācikkhanto puna caparaṃ udāyītiādimāha.
atk-s0202a:747_2: Tattha abhiññāvosānapāramippattāti abhiññāvosānasaṅkhātañceva abhiññāpāramīsaṅkhātañca arahattaṃ pattā.
atk-s0202a:748_11: sā bhāvanāpāripūrī”ti evaṃ purimaṃ purimassa pacchimaṃ pacchimassa atthotipi veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a:750_3: anuppannā me pāpakā akusalā dhammā uppajjamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti ātappaṃ karoti.
atk-s0202a:750_4: Uppannā me pāpakā akusalā dhammā appahīyamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti ātappaṃ karoti.
atk-s0202a:750_5: Anuppannā me kusalā dhammā anuppajjamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti ātappaṃ karoti.
atk-s0202a:750_6: Uppannā me kusalā dhammā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti ātappaṃ karotī”ti.
atk-s0202a:751_0: Ettha ca pāpakā akusalāti lobhādayo veditabbā.
atk-s0202a:751_1: Anuppannā kusalā dhammāti samathavipassanā ceva maggo ca,
atk-s0202a:751_3: Maggo pana sakiṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhamāno anatthāya saṃvattanako nāma natthi.
atk-s0202a:751_4: So hi phalassa paccayaṃ datvāva nirujjhati.
atk-s0202a:752_0: Tattha “uppannā samathavipassanā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvattantī”ti atthassa āvibhāvatthamidaṃ vatthu –
atk-s0202a:752_1: eko kira khīṇāsavatthero “mahācetiyañca mahābodhiñca vandissāmī”ti samāpattilābhinā bhaṇḍagāhakasāmaṇerena
atk-s0202a:752_2: saddhiṃ janapadato mahāvihāraṃ āgantvā vihārapariveṇaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0202a:752_3: Sāyanhasamaye mahābhikkhusaṅghe cetiyaṃ vandamāne cetiyaṃ vandanatthāya na nikkhami. Kasmā?
atk-s0202a:752_4: Khīṇāsavānañhi tīsu ratanesu mahantaṃ gāravaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a:752_5: Tasmā bhikkhusaṅghe vanditvā paṭikkamante manussānaṃ sāyamāsabhuttavelāyaṃ sāmaṇerampi ajānāpetvā “cetiyaṃ vandissāmī”ti ekakova nikkhami.
atk-s0202a:752_7: “kiṃ nu kho thero avelāya ekakova gacchati,
atk-s0202a:752_9: Thero anāvajjanena tassa āgamanaṃ ajānanto dakkhiṇadvārena cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruhi.
atk-s0202a:753_0: Mahāthero mahācetiyaṃ ulloketvā buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ gahetvā sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā haṭṭhapahaṭṭho cetiyaṃ vandati.
atk-s0202a:753_1: Sāmaṇero therassa vandanākāraṃ disvā “upajjhāyo me ativiya pasannacitto vandati,
atk-s0202a:753_2: kiṃ nu kho pupphāni labhitvā pūjaṃ kareyyā”ti cintesi.
atk-s0202a:753_3: Thero vanditvā uṭṭhāya sirasi añjaliṃ ṭhapetvā mahācetiyaṃ ulloketvā ṭhito.
atk-s0202a:753_7: Ativiya pasannā cetiyaṃ vandittha kiṃ nu kho pupphāni labhitvā pūjeyyāthāti?
atk-s0202a:753_8: Āma sāmaṇera imasmiṃ cetiye viya aññatra ettakaṃ dhātūnaṃ nidhānaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0202a:753_9: evarūpaṃ asadisaṃ mahāthūpaṃ pupphāni labhitvā ko na pūjeyyāti. Tena hi, bhante,
atk-s0202a:753_11: āharissāmīti tāvadeva jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā iddhiyā himavantaṃ gantvā vaṇṇagandhasampannapupphāni parissāvanaṃ
atk-s0202a:753_12: pūretvā mahāthere dakkhiṇamukhato pacchimaṃ mukhaṃ asampatteyeva āgantvā pupphaparissāvanaṃ hatthe ṭhapetvā “pūjetha,
atk-s0202a:754_0: Thero pacchimamukhanissitena sopāṇena āruyha kucchivedikābhūmiyaṃ pupphapūjaṃ kātuṃ āraddho.
atk-s0202a:754_1: Vedikābhūmiyaṃ paripuṇṇāni pupphāni patitvā dutiyabhūmiyaṃ jaṇṇupamāṇena odhinā pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0202a:754_6: Tasmiṃ paripuṇṇe “sāmaṇera pupphāni na khīyantī”ti āha.
atk-s0202a:754_11: Parissāvanaṃ sāmaṇerassa datvā saddhiṃ hatthipākārena cetiyaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditvā pariveṇaṃ gacchanto cintesi –
atk-s0202a:754_13: sakkhissati nu kho imaṃ iddhānubhāvaṃ rakkhitu”nti.
atk-s0202a:754_16: evarūpaṃ pana iddhiṃ nāsetvā pacchimakāle kāṇapesakāriyā hatthena madditakañjiyaṃ pivissasī”ti.
atk-s0202a:754_21: amhākaṃ upajjhāyo kiṃ vadatīti taṃ pana asuṇanto viya agamāsi.
atk-s0202a:755_0: Thero mahācetiyañca mahābodhiñca vanditvā sāmaṇeraṃ pattacīvaraṃ gāhāpetvā anupubbena kuṭeḷitissamahāvihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0202a:755_1: Sāmaṇero upajjhāyassa padānupadiko hutvā bhikkhācāraṃ na gacchati,
atk-s0202a:755_3: bhante,”ti pucchitvā pana “idāni me upajjhāyo gāmadvāraṃ patto bhavissatī”ti ñatvā attano ca upajjhāyassa
atk-s0202a:755_4: ca pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā ākāsena gantvā therassa pattacīvaraṃ datvā piṇḍāya pavisati.
atk-s0202a:755_9: santāya samāpattiyā parihīnāya brahmacariyavāso santhambhituṃ na sakkotī”ti.
atk-s0202a:755_10: Sāmaṇero “kiṃ katheti mayhaṃ upajjhāyo”ti sotuṃ na icchati,
atk-s0202a:755_12: Thero anupubbena cetiyavandanaṃ karonto kammubinduvihāraṃ nāma gato.
atk-s0202a:755_13: Tattha vasantepi there sāmaṇero tatheva karoti.
atk-s0202a:756_0: Athekadivasaṃ ekā pesakāradhītā abhirūpā paṭhamavaye ṭhitā kammabindugāmato nikkhamitvā padumassaraṃ oruyha gāyamānā pupphāni bhañjati.
atk-s0202a:756_2: gacchanto pana silesikāya kāṇamacchikā viya tassā gītasadde bajjhi.
atk-s0202a:756_5: Santasamāpattibalena pana tattheva udakapiṭṭhe apatitvā simbalitūlaṃ viya patamānaṃ anupubbena padumasaratīre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0202a:756_6: So vegena gantvā upajjhāyassa pattacīvaraṃ datvā nivatti.
atk-s0202a:756_8: nivāriyamānopi na nivattissatī”ti kiñci avatvā piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0202a:757_0: Sāmaṇero gantvā padumasaratīre aṭṭhāsi tassā paccuttaraṇaṃ āgamayamāno.
atk-s0202a:757_1: Sāpi sāmaṇeraṃ ākāsena gacchantañca puna āgantvā ṭhitañca disvā “addhā esa maṃ nissāya ukkaṇṭhito”ti ñatvā “paṭikkama sāmaṇerā”ti āha.
atk-s0202a:757_3: Itarā paccuttaritvā sāṭakaṃ nivāsetvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā “kiṃ,
atk-s0202a:757_6: Sā bahūhi kāraṇehi gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ brahmacariyavāse ānisaṃsañca dassetvā ovadamānāpi tassa ukkaṇṭhaṃ vinodetuṃ asakkontī –
atk-s0202a:757_8: na dāni yuttaṃ pariccajitu”nti idheva tiṭṭhāti vatvā gharaṃ gantvā mātāpitūnaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0202a:757_9: Tepi āgantvā nānappakāraṃ ovadamānā vacanaṃ aggaṇhantaṃ āhaṃsu –
atk-s0202a:757_13: “upāsaka gihibhūto nāma pesakārakammaṃ vā kareyya naḷakārakammaṃ vā,
atk-s0202a:757_15: Pesakāro udare baddhasāṭakaṃ datvā gharaṃ netvā dhītaraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0202a:758_0: So pesakārakammaṃ uggaṇhitvā pesakārehi saddhiṃ sālāya kammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0202a:758_1: Aññesaṃ itthiyo pātova bhattaṃ sampādetvā āhariṃsu,
atk-s0202a:758_3: So itaresu kammaṃ vissajjetvā bhuñjamānesu tasaraṃ vaṭṭento nisīdi.
atk-s0202a:758_6: Mātugāmo ca nāma api cakkavattirājānaṃ attani paṭibaddhacittaṃ ñatvā dāsaṃ viya sallakkheti.
atk-s0202a:758_11: tvampi mayhaṃ ghare idaṃ atthi idaṃ natthīti na jānāsi.
atk-s0202a:758_16: vācāyapi maṃ ghaṭṭesī”ti kujjhitvā aññaṃ paharaṇaṃ apassanto tameva tasaradaṇḍakaṃ tasarato luñcitvā khipi.
atk-s0202a:758_17: Sā taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā īsakaṃ parivatti.
atk-s0202a:758_18: Tasaradaṇḍakassa ca koṭi nāma tikhiṇā hoti,
atk-s0202a:758_19: sā tassā parivattamānāya akkhikoṭiyaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0202a:758_20: Sā ubhohi hatthehi vegena akkhiṃ aggahesi,
atk-s0202a:758_22: So tasmiṃ kāle upajjhāyassa vacanaṃ anussari –
atk-s0202a:758_23: “idaṃ sandhāya maṃ upajjhāyo ‘anāgate kāle kāṇapesakāriyā hatthehi madditakañjiyaṃ pivissasī’ti āha,
atk-s0202a:758_25: aho dīghadassī ayyo”ti mahāsaddena rodituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0202a:758_27: akkhi nāma bhinnaṃ na sakkā rodanena paṭipākatikaṃ kātu”nti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0202a:758_29: apica kho imaṃ sandhāya rodāmī”ti sabbaṃ paṭipāṭiyā kathesi.
atk-s0202a:758_30: Evaṃ uppannā samathavipassanā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvattanti.
atk-s0202a:759_1: tiṃsamattā bhikkhū kalyāṇimahācetiyaṃ vanditvā aṭavimaggena mahāmaggaṃ otaramānā antarāmagge jhāmakhette
atk-s0202a:759_2: kammaṃ katvā āgacchantaṃ ekaṃ manussaṃ addasaṃsu.
atk-s0202a:759_4: Masimakkhitaṃyeva ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ kacchaṃ pīḷetvā nivatthaṃ,
atk-s0202a:759_6: So divasabhāge kammaṃ katvā upaḍḍhajjhāyamānānaṃ dārūnaṃ kalāpaṃ ukkhipitvā piṭṭhiyaṃ vippakiṇṇehi kesehi
atk-s0202a:759_9: tuyhaṃ pitā tuyhaṃ mahāpitā tuyhaṃ mātulo”ti hasamānā gantvā “konāmo tvaṃ upāsakā”ti nāmaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0202a:759_10: So nāmaṃ pucchito vippaṭisārī hutvā dārukalāpaṃ chaḍḍetvā vatthaṃ saṃvidhāya nivāsetvā mahāthere vanditvā “tiṭṭhatha tāva,
atk-s0202a:760_0: Daharasāmaṇerā āgantvā mahātherānaṃ sammukhāpi parihāsaṃ karonti.
atk-s0202a:760_6: ahaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo ahosiṃ,
atk-s0202a:760_14: ahaṃ imeheva hatthehi idha nisinnova candimasūriye parāmasiṃ.
atk-s0202a:760_15: Imesaṃyeva pādānaṃ candimasūriye pādakathalikaṃ katvā nisīdiṃ.
atk-s0202a:760_20: Tasmā tumhe maññeva ārammaṇaṃ karitvā appamattā hotha,
atk-s0202a:760_22: Te tassa kathentasseva saṃvegaṃ āpajjitvā vipassamānā tiṃsajanā tattheva arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti.
atk-s0202a:760_23: Evampi uppannā samathavipassanā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvattantīti veditabbā.
atk-s0202a:761_0: Anuppannānaṃ pāpakānanti cettha “anuppanno vā kāmāsavo na uppajjatī”tiādīsu vuttanayena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0202a:761_1: Uppannānaṃ pāpakānanti ettha pana catubbidhaṃ uppannaṃ vattamānuppannaṃ bhutvāvigatuppannaṃ,
atk-s0202a:761_6: Kamme pana javite ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavitvā niruddhavipāko bhutvā vigataṃ nāma.
atk-s0202a:761_7: Kammaṃ uppajjitvā niruddhaṃ bhavitvā vigataṃ nāma.
atk-s0202a:761_9: Kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ aññassa kammassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karoti,
atk-s0202a:761_10: evaṃ kate okāse vipāko uppajjamāno okāsakaraṇato paṭṭhāya uppannoti saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0202a:761_14: Tesu anusayitakilesā pana atītā vā anāgatā vā paccuppannā vāti na vattabbā.
atk-s0202a:761_20: “tāsu tāsu bhūmīsu asamugghātitakilesā bhūmiladdhuppannāti saṅkhaṃ gacchantī”ti.
atk-s0202a:762_4: Sakiṃ cakkhūni ummīletvā ārammaṇe nimitte gahite anussaritānussaritakkhaṇe kilesā nuppajjissantīti na vattabbā. Kasmā?
atk-s0202a:762_7: Yathā khīrarukkhassa kuṭhāriyā āhatāhataṭṭhāne khīraṃ na nikkhamissatīti na vattabbaṃ, evaṃ.
atk-s0202a:762_9: Samāpattiyā avikkhambhitā kilesā pana imasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne nuppajjissantīti na vattabbā. Kasmā?
atk-s0202a:762_13: imasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne khīraṃ na nikkhameyyāti na vattabbaṃ, evaṃ.
atk-s0202a:762_15: Maggena asamugghātitakilesā pana bhavagge nibbattassāpi uppajjantīti purimanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a:763_0: Imesu uppannesu vattamānuppannaṃ bhutvāvigatuppannaṃ okāsakatuppannaṃ samudācāruppannanti catubbidhaṃ uppannaṃ na maggavajjhaṃ,
atk-s0202a:763_1: bhūmiladdhuppannaṃ ārammaṇādhigahituppannaṃ avikkhambhituppannaṃ asamugghātituppannanti catubbidhaṃ maggavajjhaṃ.
atk-s0202a:763_2: Maggo hi uppajjamāno ete kilese pajahati.
atk-s0202a:763_4: te atītā vā anāgatā vā paccuppannā vāti na vattabbā.
atk-s0202a:765_6: tenassa neva atītāni phalāni nāsitāni honti,
atk-s0202a:765_14: athassa pathavīrasañca āporasañca āgamma yāni phalāni nibbatteyyuṃ,
atk-s0202a:765_19: evameva maggo nāpi atītādibhede kilese pajahati,
atk-s0202a:765_21: Yesañhi kilesānaṃ maggena khandhesu apariññātesu uppatti siyā,
atk-s0202a:765_22: maggena uppajjitvā khandhānaṃ pariññātattā te kilesā ajātāva na jāyanti,
atk-s0202a:765_26: byādhitānaṃ rogavūpasamanatthaṃ pītabhesajjehi cāpi ayamattho vibhāvetabbo.
atk-s0202a:765_28: te atītā vā anāgatā vā paccuppannā vāti na vattabbā,
atk-s0202a:765_29: na ca maggo kilese na pajahati.
atk-s0202a:766_1: kilesānaṃ pana appahīnattā ye ca uppajjeyyuṃ upādinnakakkhandhā,
atk-s0202a:766_4: “sotāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena satta bhave ṭhapetvā anamatagge saṃsāre ye uppajjeyyuṃ nāmañca rūpañca,
atk-s0202a:767_0: Atha maggakkhaṇe kathaṃ anuppannānaṃ uppādāya bhāvanā hoti,
atk-s0202a:767_3: Maggo hi pavattamāno pubbe anuppannapubbattā anuppanno nāma vuccati.
atk-s0202a:767_4: Anāgatapubbañhi ṭhānaṃ āgantvā ananubhūtapubbaṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ anubhavitvā vattāro bhavanti “anāgataṭṭhānaṃ āgatamhā,
atk-s0202a:767_7: ayameva ṭhiti nāmāti ṭhitiyā bhāvetītipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0202a:770_6: pituaṅke vissaṭṭhaṅgapaccaṅgassa dārakassa sayanaṃ viya aniggahitabhāvena nirāsaṅkatāya ārammaṇe pavattīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a:770_9: Rūpī rūpāni passatīti ettha ajjhattakesādīsu nīlakasiṇādivasena uppāditaṃ rūpajjhānaṃ rūpaṃ,
atk-s0202a:770_11: Bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti bahiddhāpi nīlakasiṇādīni rūpāni jhānacakkhunā passati.
atk-s0202a:770_12: Iminā ajjhatta bahiddhāvatthukesu kasiṇesu uppāditajjhānassa puggalassa cattāripi rūpāvacarajjhānāni dassitāni.
atk-s0202a:771_2: Iminā bahiddhā parikammaṃ katvā bahiddhāva uppāditajjhānassa rūpāvacarajjhānāni dassitāni.
atk-s0202a:771_3: Subhanteva adhimutto hotīti iminā suvisuddhesu nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu jhānāni dassitāni.
atk-s0202a:771_4: Tattha kiñcāpi antoappanāyaṃ subhanti ābhogo natthi,
atk-s0202a:771_5: yo pana suvisuddhaṃ subhakasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā viharati,
atk-s0202a:771_6: so yasmā subhanti adhimutto hotīti vattabbataṃ āpajjati,
atk-s0202a:771_8: Paṭisambhidāmagge pana “kathaṃ subhanteva adhimutto hotīti vimokkho.
atk-s0202a:771_9: Idha bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati…pe…
atk-s0202a:771_13: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati…pe…
atk-s0202a:771_15: Evaṃ subhanteva adhimutto hotīti vimokkho”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a:772_2: Ayaṃ aṭṭhamo vimokkhoti ayaṃ catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ sabbaso vissaṭṭhattā vimuttattā aṭṭhamo uttamo vimokkho nāma.
atk-s0202a:773_6: Ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññītiādīsu pana ajjhattarūpe parikammavasena ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī nāma hoti.
atk-s0202a:773_7: Ajjhattañca nīlaparikammaṃ karonto kese vā pitte vā akkhitārakāya vā karoti,
atk-s0202a:773_8: pītaparikammaṃ karonto mede vā chaviyā vā hatthatalapādatalesu vā akkhīnaṃ pītaṭṭhāne vā karoti,
atk-s0202a:773_9: lohitaparikammaṃ karonto maṃse vā lohite vā jivhāya vā akkhīnaṃ rattaṭṭhāne vā karoti,
atk-s0202a:773_10: odātaparikammaṃ karonto aṭṭhimhi vā dante vā nakhe vā akkhīnaṃ setaṭṭhāne vā karoti.
atk-s0202a:773_11: Taṃ pana sunīlaṃ supītakaṃ sulohitakaṃ suodātaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0202a:774_0: Eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti yassetaṃ parikammaṃ ajjhattaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
atk-s0202a:774_2: so evaṃ ajjhattaṃ parikammassa bahiddhā ca appanāya vasena –
atk-s0202a:774_3: “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0202a:774_5: Suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānīti suvaṇṇāni vā hontu dubbaṇṇāni vā,
atk-s0202a:774_7: Tāni abhibhuyyāti yathā nāma sampannagahaṇiko kaṭacchumattaṃ bhattaṃ labhitvā “kimettha bhuñjitabbaṃ atthī”ti saṅkaḍḍhitvā ekakabaḷameva karoti,
atk-s0202a:774_10: nāyaṃ mama bhāro”ti tāni rūpāni abhibhavitvā samāpajjati,
atk-s0202a:774_12: Jānāmi passāmīti iminā panassa ābhogo kathito,
atk-s0202a:774_15: Evaṃsaññī hotīti ābhogasaññāyapi jhānasaññāyapi evaṃsaññī hoti.
atk-s0202a:775_2: Abhibhuyyāti ettha pana yathā mahagghaso puriso ekaṃ bhattavaḍḍhitakaṃ labhitvā “aññāpi hotu,
atk-s0202a:775_4: kimesā mayhaṃ karissatī”ti taṃ na mahantato passati,
atk-s0202a:775_7: na mayhaṃ cittekaggatākaraṇe bhāro atthī”ti tāni abhibhavitvā samāpajjati,
atk-s0202a:776_0: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti alābhitāya vā anatthikatāya vā ajjhattarūpe parikammasaññāvirahito.
atk-s0202a:776_1: Eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti yassa parikammampi nimittampi bahiddhāva uppannaṃ,
atk-s0202a:776_2: so evaṃ bahiddhā parikammassa ceva appanāya ca vasena –
atk-s0202a:776_3: “ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0202a:776_5: Imesu pana catūsu parittaṃ vitakkacaritavasena āgataṃ,
atk-s0202a:776_10: Sā ca nesaṃ sappāyatā vitthārato visuddhimaggecariyaniddese vuttā.
atk-s0202a:777_3: Apaññāyamānavivarāni asambhinnavaṇṇāni ekanīlāneva hutvā dissantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a:777_7: Visuddhavaṇṇavaseneva hi imāni cattāri abhibhāyatanāni vuttāni.
atk-s0202a:777_8: Umāpupphanti etañhi pupphaṃ siniddhaṃ muduṃ dissamānampi nīlameva hoti.
atk-s0202a:777_16: dvīsu passesu maṭṭhaṃ mudu siniddhaṃ khāyati.
atk-s0202a:777_18: “Nīlakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto nīlasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti pupphasmiṃ vā vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā vā”tiādikaṃ
atk-s0202a:777_19: panettha kasiṇakaraṇañceva parikammañca appanāvidhānañca sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vitthārato vuttameva.
atk-s0202a:778_0: Abhiññāvosānapāramippattāti ito pubbesu satipaṭṭhānādīsu te dhamme bhāvetvā arahattappattāva abhiññāvosānapāramippattā nāma honti,
atk-s0202a:778_1: imesu pana aṭṭhasu abhibhāyatanesu ciṇṇavasībhāvāyeva abhiññāvosānapāramippattā nāma.
atk-s0202a:779_2: tadārammaṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ khettaṭṭhena adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vā āyatanāni.
atk-s0202a:779_9: Tena tena kāraṇena evaṃ pasāreti ālokamiva rūpadassanakāmo.
atk-s0202a:779_14: Yathā hi udakaṃ paviṭṭhassa sabbadisāsu udakameva hoti anaññaṃ,
atk-s0202a:779_18: Appamāṇanti idaṃ tassa tassa pharaṇaappamāṇavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a:779_26: Kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānayena panetāni pathavīkasiṇādīni vitthārato visuddhimagge vuttāneva.
atk-s0202a:780_2: Ettha sitamettha paṭibaddhanti ettha cātumahābhūtike kāye nissitañca paṭibaddhañca.
atk-s0202a:780_8: Sabbākārasampannoti dhovana vedhanādīhi sabbehi ākārehi sampanno.
atk-s0202a:781_0: Evameva khoti ettha evaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ –
atk-s0202a:781_4: Hatthe karitvā paccavekkhato “ayaṃ kho maṇī”ti maṇino āvibhūtakālo viya vipassanāñāṇaṃ abhinīharitvā
atk-s0202a:781_6: “Tatridaṃ suttaṃ āvuta”nti suttassa āvibhūtakālo viya vipassanāñāṇaṃ abhinīharitvā nisinnassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0202a:781_7: tadārammaṇānaṃ phassapañcamakānaṃ vā sabbacittacetasikānaṃ vā vipassanāñāṇasseva vā āvibhūtakāloti.
atk-s0202a:782_2: tassa pana āvibhāvattā puggalassa āvibhūtāva honti.
atk-s0202a:782_4: evaṃ santepi yasmā abhiññāvāre āraddhe etassa antarāvāro natthi,
atk-s0202a:782_6: Yasmā ca aniccādivasena akatasammasanassa dibbāya sotadhātuyā bheravasaddaṃ suṇanto pubbenivāsānussatiyā
atk-s0202a:782_7: bherave khandhe anussarato dibbena cakkhunā bheravarūpaṃ passato bhayasantāso uppajjati,
atk-s0202a:782_9: tasmā abhiññāpattassa bhayavinodakahetusampādanatthampi idaṃ idheva dassitaṃ.
atk-s0202a:783_3: Sabbaṅgapaccaṅginti sabbehi aṅgehi ca paccaṅgehi ca samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0202a:783_8: tampi aviddhakaṇṇanti evaṃ sabbākārehi tena sadisameva hoti.
atk-s0202a:783_9: Muñjamhā īsikantiādi upamattayampi taṃ sadisabhāvadassanatthameva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a:783_10: Muñjasadisā eva hi tassa anto īsikā hoti.
atk-s0202a:784_3: Tattha kiñcāpi “puriso ahiṃ karaṇḍā uddhareyyā”ti hatthena uddharamāno viya dassito,
atk-s0202a:784_8: sarīraṃ khādamānaṃ viya purāṇatacaṃ jigucchantoti imehi catūhi kāraṇehi sayameva kañcukaṃ jahāti,
atk-s0202a:784_10: Tasmā cittena uddharaṇaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a:784_13: Nimmānavidhānaṃ panettha parato ca iddhividhādipañcaabhiññākathā sabbākārena visuddhimagge vitthāritāti tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0202a:785_0: Tattha chekakumbhakārādayo viya iddhividhañāṇalābhī bhikkhu daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0202a:785_2: Icchiticchitabhājanavikatiādikaraṇaṃ viya tassa bhikkhuno vikubbanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a:786_4: Tattha evaṃ cātuddisā viññāpente saṅkhadhamake “saṅkhasaddo aya”nti vavatthāpentānaṃ sattānaṃ tassa saṅkhasaddassa
atk-s0202a:786_5: āvibhūtakālo viya yogino dūrasantikabhedānaṃ dibbānañceva mānusakānañca saddānaṃ āvibhūtakālo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0202a:787_4: Maṇḍanakajātikoti yuvāpi samāno na alasiyo kiliṭṭhavatthasarīro,
atk-s0202a:787_6: divasassa dve tayo vāre nhāyitvā suddhavattha-
atk-s0202a:787_11: Tattha yathā tassa mukhanimittaṃ paccavekkhato mukhadoso pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0202a:787_12: evaṃ cetopariyañāṇāya cittaṃ abhinīharitvā nisinnassa bhikkhuno paresaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ cittaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a:788_1: Ayaṃ kho udāyi pañcamo dhammoti ekūnavīsati pabbāni paṭipadāvasena ekaṃ dhammaṃ katvā pañcamo dhammoti vutto.
atk-s0202a:788_2: Yathā hi aṭṭhakanāgarasutte ekādasa pabbāni pucchāvasena ekadhammo kato,
atk-s0202a:788_3: evamidha ekūnavīsati pabbāni paṭipadāvasena eko dhammo katoti veditabbāni.
atk-s0202a:788_4: Imesu ca pana ekūnavīsatiyā pabbesu paṭipāṭiyā aṭṭhasu koṭṭhāsesu vipassanāñāṇe ca āsavakkhayañāṇe ca
atk-s0202a:792_4: Kiñci kiñci pana uggahituṃ uggāhetuṃ samatthatāya uggāhamānoti naṃ sañjānanti.
atk-s0202a:792_6: Tasmiṃ kira ṭhāne caṅkītārukkhapokkharasātippabhutayo brāhmaṇā nigaṇṭhācelakaparibbājakādayo ca pabbajitā
atk-s0202a:792_7: sannipatitvā attano attano samayaṃ pavadanti kathenti dīpenti,
atk-s0202a:792_10: Yasmā panettha paṭhamaṃ ekā sālā ahosi,
atk-s0202a:792_11: pacchā mahāpuññaṃ poṭṭhapādaparibbājakaṃ nissāya bahū sālā katā,
atk-s0202a:792_12: tasmā tameva ekaṃ sālaṃ upādāya laddhanāmavasena ekasālakoti vuccati.
atk-s0202a:792_13: Mallikāya pana pasenadirañño deviyā uyyānabhūto so pupphaphalasañchanno ārāmoti katvā mallikāya ārāmoti saṅkhaṃ gato.
atk-s0202a:792_14: Tasmiṃ samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake mallikāya ārāme.
atk-s0202a:792_16: Divā divassāti divasassa divā nāma majjhanhātikkamo,
atk-s0202a:792_17: tasmiṃ divasassapi divābhūte atikkantamatte majjhanhike nikkhamīti attho.
atk-s0202a:792_18: Paṭisallīnoti tato tato rūpādigocarato cittaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā līno,
atk-s0202a:792_21: ye āvajjato manasikaroto cittaṃ vinīvaraṇaṃ hoti unnamati vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0202a:792_23: Ayaṃ tesaṃ aññataroti ayaṃ tesaṃ abbhantaro eko sāvako.
atk-s0202a:792_24: Appeva nāmāti tassa upasaṅkamanaṃ patthayamāno āha.
atk-s0202a:793_2: dhammakathāya naṃ saṅgaṇhitvā attano sāvakaṃ karissāmīti maññamāno etaṃ “catūhi kho”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0202a:793_6: Ayojjhanti vādayuddhena yujjhitvā cāletuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ acalaṃ nikkampaṃ thiraṃ.
atk-s0202a:793_8: ettha pana saṃvarappahānaṃ vā paṭisevanappahānaṃ vā na vadati.
atk-s0202a:794_0: Neva abhinandīti titthiyā nāma jānitvāpi ajānitvāpi yaṃ vā taṃ vā vadantīti maññamāno nābhinandi.
atk-s0202a:794_1: Na paṭikkosīti sāsanassa anulomaṃ viya pasannākāraṃ viya vadatīti maññamāno na paṭisedheti.
atk-s0202a:795_2: evaṃ sante uttānaseyyako kumāro ayojjhasamaṇo thirasamaṇo bhavissati,
atk-s0202a:795_3: mayaṃ pana evaṃ na vadāmāti dīpeti.
atk-s0202a:795_4: Kāyotipi na hotīti sakakāyo parakāyotipi visesañāṇaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0202a:795_5: Aññatra phanditamattāti paccattharaṇe valisamphassena vā maṅguladaṭṭhena vā kāyaphandanamattaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0202a:795_6: Taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ kāyena karaṇakammaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0202a:795_8: Vācātipi na hotīti micchāvācā sammāvācātipi nānattaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0202a:795_11: Saṅkappoti micchāsaṅkappo sammāsaṅkappotipi nānattaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0202a:795_17: Ājīvoti micchājīvo sammājīvotipi nānattaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0202a:795_19: mātari khīraṃ pāyantiyā apivitvā aññavihitakāle piṭṭhipassena āgantvā thaññaṃ pivanti.
atk-s0202a:796_1: Evaṃ paribbājakavādaṃ paṭikkhipitvā idāni sayaṃ sekkhabhūmiyaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapento catūhi kho ahantiādimāha.
atk-s0202a:796_3: Na kāyena pāpa kammantiādīsu na kevalaṃ akaraṇamattameva,
atk-s0202a:796_6: Na ceva sampannakusalantiādi pana khīṇāsavaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a:797_0: Idāni asekkhabhūmiyaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapento dasahi kho ahantiādimāha.
atk-s0202a:797_1: Tattha tīṇi padāni nissāya dve paṭhamacatukkā ṭhapitā,
atk-s0202a:798_1: Idāni taṃ vibhajanto katame ca thapati akusalasīlātiādimāha.
atk-s0202a:798_7: Itosamuṭṭhānāti ito sarāgādicittato samuṭṭhānaṃ uppatti etesanti itosamuṭṭhānā.
atk-s0202a:799_0: Kuhinti kataraṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇitvā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
atk-s0202a:799_3: taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā akusalasīlaṃ asesaṃ nirujjhati.
atk-s0202a:800_0: Akusalānaṃ sīlānaṃ nirodhāya paṭipannoti ettha yāva sotāpattimaggā nirodhāya paṭipanno nāma hoti,
atk-s0202a:800_1: phalapatte pana te nirodhitā nāma honti.
atk-s0202a:801_0: 265. Vītarāgantiādīhi aṭṭhavidhaṃ kāmāvacarakusalacittameva vuttaṃ. Etena hi kusalasīlaṃ samuṭṭhāti.
atk-s0202a:802_0: Sīlavā hotīti sīlasampanno hoti guṇasampanno ca.
atk-s0202a:802_2: natthi ito kiñci uttari karaṇīyanti evaṃ sīlamayo na hoti.
atk-s0202a:803_0: Nirodhāya paṭipannoti ettha yāva arahattamaggā nirodhāya paṭipanno nāma hoti,
atk-s0202a:803_1: phalapatte pana te nirodhitā nāma honti.
atk-s0202a:806_0: Nirodhāya paṭipannoti ettha yāva anāgāmimaggā nirodhāya paṭipanno nāma hoti,
atk-s0202a:806_1: phalapatte pana te nirodhitā nāma honti.
atk-s0202a:807_2: Dutiyajjhānikaṃ arahattaphalañhi pāpuṇitvā kusalasaṅkappā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
atk-s0202a:807_3: Nirodhāya paṭipannoti ettha yāva arahattamaggā nirodhāya paṭipanno nāma hoti,
atk-s0202a:807_4: phalapatte pana te nirodhitā nāma honti.
atk-s0202a:811_3: bhagavāti idaṃ paribbājako dhammakathaṃ sotukāmo bhagavato dhammadesanāya sālayabhāvaṃ dassento āha.
atk-s0202a:812_2: tuyhevettha eko pañho ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ upaṭṭhātu.
atk-s0202a:812_3: Yathā maṃ paṭibhāseyyāti yena kāraṇena mama dhammadesanā upaṭṭhaheyya,
atk-s0202a:812_4: etena hi kāraṇena kathāya samuṭṭhitāya sukhaṃ dhammaṃ desetunti dīpeti.
atk-s0202a:812_8: ayametassa bhāsitassa atthoti dīpasahassaṃ viya ujjalāpetvā ajja me pākaṭaṃ akarissā”ti dasabalaṃyeva anussari.
atk-s0202a:812_12: Tena tassa bhagavantaṃ anussarantassa etadahosi “aho nūna bhagavā aho nūna sugato”ti.
atk-s0202a:812_17: tassa hi bhagavato pubbenivāsañāṇassa anekāni kappakoṭisahassāni ekaṅgaṇāni pākaṭānīti,
atk-s0202a:813_0: Tassa vāhaṃ pubbantaṃ ārabbhāti yo hi lābhī hoti,
atk-s0202a:813_2: brāhmaṇo ahosī”ti vutte jānanto sakkaccaṃ sussūsati.
atk-s0202a:813_6: “tassa vāhaṃ pubbantaṃ ārabbha pañhassa veyyākaraṇena cittaṃ ārādheyya”nti.
atk-s0202a:814_0: So vā maṃ aparantanti dibbacakkhulābhino hi anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ ijjhati,
atk-s0202a:815_0: Dhammaṃ te desessāmīti ayaṃ kira atīte desiyamānepi na bujjhissati,
atk-s0202a:815_2: Athassa bhagavā saṇhasukhumaṃ paccayākāraṃ desetukāmo evamāha.
atk-s0202a:815_5: anāgate panassa vāsanāya paccayo bhavissatīti disvā bhagavā evamāha.
atk-s0202a:816_1: So hi ekaṃ mūlaṃ gahetvā adissamānakāyo hoti.
atk-s0202a:816_3: ekā kira yakkhinī dve dārake thūpārāmadvāre nisīdāpetvā āhārapariyesanatthaṃ nagaraṃ gatā.
atk-s0202a:816_6: tassā vadeyyātha ‘yaṃ vā taṃ vā laddhakaṃ,
atk-s0202a:816_8: dārakā te jighacchitaṃ sandhāretuṃ na sakkontī”’ti.
atk-s0202a:816_12: so dārakehi dinnasaññāṇena taṃ yakkhiniṃ addasa virūpaṃ bībhacchaṃ kevalaṃ vīthiyaṃ gabbhamalaṃ paccāsīsamānaṃ.
atk-s0202a:816_14: Kathaṃ maṃ tvaṃ passasīti vutte mūlakhaṇḍaṃ dassesi,
atk-s0202a:816_16: Evaṃ paṃsupisācakā ekaṃ mūlaṃ gahetvā adissamānakāyā honti.
atk-s0202a:816_18: Na pakkhāyatīti na dissati na upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0202a:817_1: Dīghāpi kho te esāti udāyi esā tava vācā dīghāpi bhaveyya,
atk-s0202a:817_4: Appāṭihīrakatanti aniyyānikaṃ amūlakaṃ niratthakaṃ sampajjatīti attho.
atk-s0202a:818_2: Tattha paṇḍukambale nikkhittoti visabhāgavaṇṇe rattakambale ṭhapito.
atk-s0202a:818_3: Evaṃvaṇṇo attā hotīti idaṃ so subhakiṇhadevaloke nibbattakkhandhe sandhāya –
atk-s0202a:818_4: “amhākaṃ matakāle attā subhakiṇhadevaloke khandhā viya jotetī”ti vadati.
atk-s0202a:819_1: Ayaṃ imesaṃ ubhinnanti so kira yasmā maṇissa bahi ābhā na niccharati,
atk-s0202a:820_5: Sā hi yasmā tassā udayato paṭṭhāya tena saññāṇena osadhāni gaṇhantipi pivantipi,
atk-s0202a:822_1: Idāni yasmā so “ekantasukhaṃ lokaṃ pucchissāmī”ti nisinno,
atk-s0202a:822_3: tasmā naṃ bhagavā taṃ pucchaṃ sarāpento kiṃ pana, udāyi,
atk-s0202a:822_6: Aññataraṃ vā pana tapoguṇanti acelakapāḷiṃ sandhāyāha,
atk-s0202a:823_5: paṭipadaṃ pana kālena sukhaṃ kālena dukkhaṃ vadāma.
atk-s0202a:823_6: Ekantasukhassa kho pana attano paṭipadāyapi ekantasukhāya bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a:823_9: Idāni satthāraṃyeva pucchitvā jānissāmīti tasmā pucchati.
atk-s0202a:824_0: Ettha mayaṃ anassāmāti etasmiṃ kāraṇe mayaṃ anassāma.
atk-s0202a:824_2: Te kira pubbe pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā tatiyajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhānā
atk-s0202a:824_4: gacchante gacchante pana kāle kasiṇaparikammampi na jāniṃsu,
atk-s0202a:824_6: Pañca pubbabhāgadhamme pana “ākāravatī paṭipadā”ti uggahetvā tatiyajjhānaṃ “ekantasukho loko”ti uggaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0202a:824_8: Uttaritaranti ito pañcahi dhammehi uttaritaraṃ paṭipadaṃ vā tatiyajjhānato uttaritaraṃ ekantasukhaṃ lokaṃ vā na jānāmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a:824_9: Appasadde katvāti ekappahāreneva mahāsaddaṃ kātuṃ āraddhe nissadde katvā.
atk-s0202a:825_1: Sacchikiriyāhetūti ettha dve sacchikiriyā paṭilābhasacchikiriyā ca paccakkhasacchikiriyā ca.
atk-s0202a:825_2: Tattha tatiyajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā subhakiṇhaloke tesaṃ devānaṃ samānāyuvaṇṇo hutvā nibbattati,
atk-s0202a:825_4: Catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā iddhivikubbanena subhakiṇhalokaṃ gantvā tehi devehi saddhiṃ santiṭṭhati sallapati sākacchaṃ āpajjati,
atk-s0202a:825_6: Tāsaṃ dvinnampi tatiyajjhānaṃ ākāravatī paṭipadā nāma.
atk-s0202a:825_7: Tañhi anuppādetvā neva sakkā subhakiṇhaloke nibbattituṃ,
atk-s0202a:826_5: Athassa eko sahāyako bhikkhu sāsane anabhirato, “āvuso,
atk-s0202a:826_7: So tassa pattacīvare lobhaṃ uppādetvā gihibhāvāya vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0202a:826_9: Tenassa kammunā idāni bhagavato sammukhā pabbajjāya antarāyo jāto.
atk-s0202a:826_11: idaṃ bhāṇavāramattanti ettakāya tantiyā dhammo kathito,
atk-s0202a:826_13: anāgate panassa paccayo bhavissatīti bhagavā dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0202a:826_14: Anāgate paccayabhāvañcassa disvā bhagavā dharamāno ekaṃ bhikkhumpi mettāvihārimhi etadagge na ṭhapesi.
atk-s0202a:826_16: “anāgate ayaṃ mama sāsane pabbajitvā mettāvihārīnaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0202a:827_0: So bhagavati parinibbute dhammāsokarājakāle pāṭaliputte nibbattitvā pabbajitvā arahattappatto assaguttatthero nāma hutvā mettāvihārīnaṃ aggo ahosi.
atk-s0202a:827_2: thero sakalajambudīpe bhikkhusaṅghassa ovādācariyo hutvā vattanisenāsane āvasi,
atk-s0202a:827_4: Thero ākāse cammakhaṇḍaṃ pattharitvā tattha nisinno kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0202a:827_5: Gacchante gacchante kāle bhikkhācārampi agantvā vihāre nisinno kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0202a:827_7: Dhammāsokarājā therassa guṇaṃ sutvā daṭṭhukāmo tikkhattuṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0202a:827_8: Thero bhikkhusaṅghassa ovādaṃ dammīti ekavārampi na gatoti.
atk-s0202a:831_2: Tattha vekhanasoti ayaṃ kira sakuludāyissa ācariyo,
atk-s0202a:831_3: so “sakuludāyī paribbājako paramavaṇṇapañhe parājito”ti sutvā “mayā so sādhukaṃ uggahāpito,
atk-s0202a:831_6: handāhaṃ sayaṃ gantvā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ paramavaṇṇapañhaṃ pucchitvā jānissāmī”ti rājagahato pañcacattālīsayojanaṃ sāvatthiṃ gantvā yena bhagavā,
atk-s0202a:831_8: upasaṅkamitvā pana ṭhitakova bhagavato santike udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0202a:832_4: Pabbajitopi ca ekacco kāmagaruko kāmādhimutto hoti,
atk-s0202a:832_7: So imāya kathāya kathiyamānāya attano kāmādhimuttattaṃ sallakkhessati,
atk-s0202a:832_8: evamassāyaṃ desanā sappāyā bhavissatīti imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0202a:833_3: Tiṭṭhatu pubbanto tiṭṭhatu aparantoti yasmā tuyhaṃ atītakathāya anucchavikaṃ pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ natthi,
atk-s0202a:833_7: Tassa hi ārakkhatthāya hatthapādesu ceva gīvāya ca suttakāni bandhanti.
atk-s0202a:833_9: Mahallakakāle panassa tāni sayaṃ vā pūtīni hutvā muñcanti,
atk-s0202a:834_1: daharassa kumārassa suttabandhanānaṃ ajānanakālo viya avijjāya purimāya koṭiyā ajānanaṃ,
atk-s0202a:834_2: na hi sakkā avijjāya purimakoṭi ñātuṃ,
atk-s0202a:834_3: mocanakāle jānanasadisaṃ pana arahattamaggena avijjābandhanassa pamokkho jātoti jānanaṃ.
atk-s0202a:840_2: Tattha sitaṃ pātvākāsīti mahāmaggena gacchanto aññataraṃ bhūmippadesaṃ oloketvā –
atk-s0202a:840_3: “atthi nu kho mayā cariyaṃ caramānena imasmiṃ ṭhāne nivutthapubba”nti āvajjanto addasa –
atk-s0202a:840_4: “kassapabuddhakāle imasmiṃ ṭhāne vegaḷiṅgaṃ nāma gāmanigamo ahosi,
atk-s0202a:840_5: ahaṃ tadā jotipālo nāma māṇavo ahosiṃ,
atk-s0202a:840_6: mayhaṃ sahāyo ghaṭikāro nāma kumbhakāro ahosi,
atk-s0202a:840_7: tena saddhiṃ mayā idha ekaṃ sukāraṇaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0202a:840_9: handa naṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa pākaṭaṃ karomī”ti maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ padese ṭhitakova sitapātukammamakāsi,
atk-s0202a:841_3: sekkhā akusalato diṭṭhisampayuttāni dve apanetvā chahi cittehi hasanti,
atk-s0202a:841_4: khīṇāsavā catūhi sahetukakiriyacittehi ekena ahetukakiriyacittenāti pañcahi cittehi hasanti.
atk-s0202a:841_5: Tesupi balavārammaṇe āpāthagate dvīhi ñāṇasampayuttacittehi hasanti,
atk-s0202a:841_6: dubbalārammaṇe duhetukacittadvayena ca ahetukacittena cāti tīhi cittehi hasanti.
atk-s0202a:841_7: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātusomanassasahagatacittaṃ bhagavato haṭṭhapahaṭṭhākāramattaṃ hasitaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0202a:842_0: Taṃ panetaṃ hasitaṃ evaṃ appamattakampi therassa pākaṭaṃ ahosi. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0202a:842_1: Tathārūpe hi kāle tathāgatassa catūhi dāṭhāhi catuddīpikamahāmeghamukhato sateratāvijjulatā viya virocamānā
atk-s0202a:842_2: mahātālakkhandhapamāṇā rasmivaṭṭiyo uṭṭhahitvā tikkhattuṃ sīsavaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā dāṭhaggesuyeva
atk-s0202a:842_4: Tena saññāṇena āyasmā ānando bhagavato pacchato gacchamānopi sitapātubhāvaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0202a:843_4: evamayaṃ bhūmibhāgo dvīhi buddhehi paribhutto bhavissati,
atk-s0202a:843_5: mahājano gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ katvā paricaranto saggamaggaparāyaṇo bhavissatī”ti cintetvā etaṃ “tena hi,
atk-s0202a:844_3: ayaṃ pana aparipakkañāṇattā brāhmaṇakule uggahitavohāravaseneva hīḷento evamāha.
atk-s0202a:844_5: Sotti nāma kuruvindapāsāṇacuṇṇāni lākhāya bandhitvā kataguḷikakalāpakā vuccati,
atk-s0202a:844_7: “tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kuruvindakasuttiyā nahāyantī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a:844_8: Taṃ ubhosu antesu gahetvā sarīraṃ ghaṃsanti.
atk-s0202a:844_9: Evaṃ sammāti yathā etarahipi manussā “cetiyavandanāya gacchāma,
atk-s0202a:844_10: dhammassavanatthāya gacchāmā”ti vuttā ussāhaṃ na karonti,
atk-s0202a:844_12: tatheva sinhāyitunti vutte ekavacanena sampaṭicchanto evamāha.
atk-s0202a:845_1: Jotipālaṃ māṇavaṃ āmantesīti ekapasse ariyaparihārena paṭhamataraṃ nhāyitvā paccuttaritvā ṭhito tassa
atk-s0202a:845_2: mahantena issariyaparihārena nhāyantassa nhānapariyosānaṃ āgametvā taṃ nivatthanivāsanaṃ kese vodake
atk-s0202a:845_5: Ovaṭṭikaṃ vinivaṭṭhetvāti nāgabalo bodhisatto “apehi sammā”ti īsakaṃ parivattamānova tena gahitagahaṇaṃ vissajjāpetvāti attho.
atk-s0202a:845_6: Kesesu parāmasitvā etadavocāti so kira cintesi –
atk-s0202a:845_8: sakiṃ dassanaṃ labhamāno tathāgatassa dassanepi pasīdissati,
atk-s0202a:845_12: yaṃkiñci katvā mama sahāyaṃ gahetvā dasabalassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0202a:846_3: Na vatidanti idaṃ amhākaṃ gamanaṃ na vata orakaṃ bhavissati na khuddakaṃ,
atk-s0202a:846_6: satthu thāmena gaṇhīti gahaṇasmiṃyeva niṭṭhaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0202a:846_10: “vācāya ālapanaṃ ovaṭṭikāya gahaṇañca atikkamitvā yāva kesaggahaṇampi tattha gamanatthaṃ payogo kattabbo”ti.
atk-s0202a:847_1: Dhammiyā kathāyāti idha satipaṭilābhatthāya pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttā dhammī kathā veditabbā.
atk-s0202a:847_6: tādisassa nāma pamādavihāro na yutto”tiādinā nayena satipaṭilābhāya dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0202a:847_9: yathā ahaṃ dasapāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā vīsatisahassabhikkhuparivāro loke vicarāmi,
atk-s0202a:847_10: evamevaṃ tvampi dasapāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā samaṇagaṇaparivāro loke vicarissasi.
atk-s0202a:847_11: Evarūpena nāma tayā pamādaṃ āpajjituṃ na yutta”nti yathāssa pabbajjāya cittaṃ namati,
atk-s0202a:847_12: evaṃ kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ kathesīti.
atk-s0202a:848_6: Pabbajitvā ca pana ittarasattā viya patitasiṅgā na honti,
atk-s0202a:848_7: catupārisuddhisīle pana supatiṭṭhāya tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā terasa dhutaṅgāni samādāya araññaṃ
atk-s0202a:848_8: pavisitvā gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūrayamānā samaṇadhammaṃ karontā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā yāva anulomañāṇaṃ
atk-s0202a:849_1: Aḍḍhamāsupasampanneti kuladārakañhi pabbājetvā aḍḍhamāsampi avasitvā gate mātāpitūnaṃ soko na vūpasammati,
atk-s0202a:849_6: Ettakaṃ pana kālaṃ nivāse sati mātāpitaro passituṃ labhanti.
atk-s0202a:849_13: Tasmā ettakaṃ vasituṃ vaṭṭatīti aḍḍhamāsaṃ vasitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0202a:850_0: Paṇḍupuṭakassa sālinoti puṭake katvā sukkhāpitassa rattasālino.
atk-s0202a:850_1: Tassa kira sālino vappakālato paṭṭhāya ayaṃ parihāro –
atk-s0202a:850_4: vappakāle vitānaṃ viya upari vatthakilañjaṃ bandhitvā paripakkakāle vīhisīsāni chinditvā muṭṭhimatte
atk-s0202a:850_5: puṭake katvā yottabaddhe vehāsaṃyeva sukkhāpetvā gandhacuṇṇāni attharitvā koṭṭhakesu pūretvā tatiye vasse
atk-s0202a:850_7: Evaṃ tivassaṃ parivutthassa sugandharattasālino apagatakāḷake suparisuddhe taṇḍule gahetvā khajjakavikatimpi bhattampi paṭiyādiyiṃsu.
atk-s0202a:850_8: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ…pe…
atk-s0202a:851_2: Vegaḷiṅgato nikkhamanakāle ghaṭikāro attano santike vassāvāsaṃ vasanatthāya paṭiññaṃ aggahesi,
atk-s0202a:851_4: Ahudeva aññathattaṃ ahu domanassanti temāsaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ,
atk-s0202a:851_6: iminā ca niyāmena vīsati bhikkhusahassāni paṭijaggituṃ nālatthanti alābhaṃ ārabbha cittaññathattaṃ cittadomanassaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0202a:851_10: Athekasmiṃ samaye paccante kupite vūpasamanatthaṃ gacchanto uracchadaṃ nāma dhītaramāha –
atk-s0202a:851_12: Brāhmaṇā taṃ rājadhītaraṃ disvā visaññino ahesuṃ.
atk-s0202a:851_13: Ke ime cāti vutte tumhākaṃ bhūmidevāti.
atk-s0202a:851_14: Bhūmidevā nāma evarūpā hontīti niṭṭhubhitvā pāsādaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0202a:851_15: Sā ekadivasaṃ vīthiṃ olokentī ṭhitā kassapassa bhagavato aggasāvakaṃ disvā pakkosāpetvā piṇḍapātaṃ datvā
atk-s0202a:851_16: anumodanaṃ suṇamānāyeva sotāpannā hutvā “aññepi bhikkhū atthī”ti pucchitvā “satthā vīsatiyā bhikkhusahassehi
atk-s0202a:851_17: saddhiṃ isipatane vasatī”ti ca sutvā nimantetvā dānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0202a:852_1: Atha naṃ paṭhamatarameva brāhmaṇā āgantvā dhītu avaṇṇaṃ vatvā paribhindiṃsu.
atk-s0202a:852_2: Rājā pana dhītu jātakāleyeva varaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0202a:852_3: Tassā “satta divasāni rajjaṃ dātabba”nti varaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0202a:852_4: Athassā rājā satta divasāni rajjaṃ niyyātesi.
atk-s0202a:852_5: Sā satthāraṃ bhojayamānā rājānaṃ pakkosāpetvā bahisāṇiyaṃ nisīdāpesi.
atk-s0202a:852_6: Rājā satthu anumodanaṃ sutvāva sotāpanno jāto.
atk-s0202a:852_7: Sotāpannassa ca nāma tathāgataṃ ārabbha āghāto natthi.
atk-s0202a:853_0: Yaṃ icchati taṃ haratūti so kira bhājanāni pacitvā kayavikkayaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0202a:853_1: evaṃ pana vatvā dārutthāya vā mattikatthāya vā palālatthāya vā araññaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0202a:853_2: Mahājanā “ghaṭikārena bhājanāni pakkānī”ti sutvā parisuddhataṇḍulaloṇadadhitelaphāṇitādīni gahetvā āgacchanti.
atk-s0202a:853_5: yaṃ vā taṃ vā datvā gaṇhāmāti taṃ na gaṇhanti.
atk-s0202a:853_8: bahu no akusalaṃ bhavissatīti puna gantvā mūlaṃ āharanti.
atk-s0202a:853_12: amhākaṃ puññaṃ bhavissatīti yathābhataṃ gharasāmikā viya sādhukaṃ paṭisāmetvā gacchanti.
atk-s0202a:853_14: Rañño vacanapathaṃ pacchindanto andhe jiṇṇe mātāpitaro posetīti āha.
atk-s0202a:854_1: Ko nu khoti kuhiṃ nu kho.
atk-s0202a:854_6: Ghaṭikāro kira bhattaṃ pacitvā sūpaṃ sampādetvā mātāpitaro bhojetvā sayampi bhuñjitvā bhagavato vaḍḍhamānakaṃ
atk-s0202a:854_7: bhattasūpaṃ paṭṭhapetvā āsanaṃ paññapetvā ādhārakaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā udakaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0202a:854_11: Pītisukhaṃ na vijahatīti na nirantaraṃ vijahati,
atk-s0202a:854_12: atha kho rattibhāge vā divasabhāge vā gāme vā araññe vā yasmiṃ yasmiṃ khaṇe –
atk-s0202a:854_13: “sadevake nāma loke aggapuggalo mayhaṃ gehaṃ pavisitvā sahatthena āmisaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjati,
atk-s0202a:854_15: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajjati.
atk-s0202a:855_8: Yathā hi rañño uyyāne pupphaphalāni honti,
atk-s0202a:855_12: Parasamuddavāsītherā pana “devatā kira paṭiggahetvā adaṃsū”ti vadanti.
atk-s0202a:856_1: haratha bhadramukhāti amhākaṃ putto “kuhiṃ gatosī”ti vutte –
atk-s0202a:856_4: satthu vasanaṭṭhānassa ovassakabhāvampi na jānātīti putte aparādhasaññino gahaṇe tuṭṭhacittā evamāhaṃsu.
atk-s0202a:857_0: Temāsaṃ ākāsacchadanaṃ aṭṭhāsīti bhagavā kira catunnaṃ vassikānaṃ māsānaṃ ekaṃ māsaṃ atikkamitvā tiṇaṃ āharāpesi,
atk-s0202a:857_5: yathā panettha pakatiyā ca nibbakosassa udakapātaṭṭhānabbhantare ekampi udakabindu nātivassi,
atk-s0202a:857_6: evaṃ ghanachadanagehabbhantare viya na vātātapāpi ābādhaṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0202a:857_8: Aparabhāge tasmiṃ nigame chaḍḍitepi taṃ ṭhānaṃ anovassakameva ahosi.
atk-s0202a:857_9: Manussā kammaṃ karontā deve vassante tattha sāṭake ṭhapetvā kammaṃ karonti.
atk-s0202a:857_10: Yāva kappuṭṭhānā taṃ ṭhānaṃ tādisameva bhavissati.
atk-s0202a:857_11: Tañca kho pana na tathāgatassa iddhānubhāvena,
atk-s0202a:857_14: amhākaṃ nāma dvinnaṃ andhakānaṃ nivesanaṃ uttiṇaṃ kāresī”ti na tappaccayā domanassaṃ udapādi –
atk-s0202a:857_15: “sadevake loke aggapuggalo amhākaṃ nivesanā tiṇaṃ āharāpetvā gandhakuṭiṃ chādāpesī”ti pana tesaṃ anappakaṃ balavasomanassaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0202a:857_16: Iti tesaṃyeva guṇasampattiyā idaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ jātanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a:858_1: Taṇḍulavāhasatānīti ettha dve sakaṭāni eko vāhoti veditabbo.
atk-s0202a:858_3: Vīsatibhikkhusahassassa temāsatthāya bhattaṃ bhavissatīti kira saññāya rājā ettakaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0202a:858_4: Alaṃ me raññova hotūti kasmā paṭikkhipi?
atk-s0202a:858_11: addhā so rañño vassāvāsaṃ yāciyamāno mayhaṃ paṭiññātabhāvaṃ ārocetvā mama guṇakathaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0202a:858_12: guṇakathāya laddhalābho pana naṭena naccitvā laddhaṃ viya gāyakena gāyitvā laddhaṃ viya ca hoti.
atk-s0202a:858_14: kammaṃ katvā uppannena mātāpitūnampi sammāsambuddhassapi upaṭṭhānaṃ sakkā kātu”nti.
atk-s0202a:862_3: So kira janapado niccasasso sadā bījabhaṇḍaṃ nikkhamati,
atk-s0202a:862_5: Tena tasmiṃ nigame koṭṭhā niccapūrāva honti.
atk-s0202a:863_2: Bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ pāletuṃ samatthoti raṭṭhapālo.
atk-s0202a:863_5: Ito hi pubbe satasahassakappamatthake vassasatasahassāyukesu manussesu padumuttaro nāma satthā uppajjitvā
atk-s0202a:866_0: Padumuttare pana anuppanne eva haṃsavatiyā dve kuṭumbikā saddhā pasannā kapaṇaddhikayācakādīnaṃ dānaṃ paṭṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0202a:866_1: Tadā pabbatavāsino pañcasatā tāpasā haṃsavatiṃ anuppattā.
atk-s0202a:866_2: Te dvepi janā tāpasagaṇaṃ majjhe bhinditvā upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0202a:866_5: Tadā tesaṃ te yāvajīvaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0202a:866_6: Tāpasesu bhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ karontesu eko sakkabhavanassa vaṇṇaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0202a:867_0: Kuṭumbikesu eko sakkabhavanaṃ patthanaṃ katvā sakko hutvā nibbatto,
atk-s0202a:867_2: Taṃ sakko attano upaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ disvā nāgayoniyaṃ abhiramasīti pucchi.
atk-s0202a:867_4: Tena hi padumuttarassa bhagavato dānaṃ datvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne patthanaṃ karohi,
atk-s0202a:867_6: Nāgarājā satthāraṃ nimantetvā bhikkhusatasahassaparivārassa bhagavato sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ dadamāno padumuttarassa
atk-s0202a:867_7: dasabalassa puttaṃ uparevataṃ nāma sāmaṇeraṃ disvā sattame divase buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa dibbavatthāni
atk-s0202a:867_10: “anāgate gotamassa nāma buddhassa putto rāhulakumāro bhavissatī”ti disvā “samijjhissati te patthanā”ti kathesi.
atk-s0202a:867_12: Sakko tassa vacanaṃ sutvā tatheva sattāhaṃ dānaṃ datvā bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ pāletuṃ samatthakule
atk-s0202a:867_13: nibbattitvā saddhāpabbajitaṃ raṭṭhapālaṃ nāma kulaputtaṃ disvā –
atk-s0202a:867_14: “ahampi anāgate lokasmiṃ tumhādise buddhe uppanne bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ pāletuṃ samatthakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0202a:867_15: ayaṃ kulaputto viya saddhāpabbajito raṭṭhapālo nāma bhaveyya”nti patthanamakāsi.
atk-s0202a:870_0: Evaṃ padumuttarasammāsambuddhakāle tassetaṃ nāmaṃ uppannanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a:871_3: ahaṃ kho yena yena kāraṇena bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi,
atk-s0202a:871_4: tena tena me upaparikkhato evaṃ hoti –
atk-s0202a:871_5: “yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ ekadivasampi akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ caritabbaṃ,
atk-s0202a:871_6: ekadivasampi ca kilesamalena amalīnaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ,
